Name: Aru
CharacterSSRNew: Heh heh. Good choice.
ProfileIntroduction:
The self-proclaimed boss of Problem Solver 68.

Aru expanded Gehenna Academy's Problem Solver 68 club without permission to conduct illegal business activities. She aspires to be seen as a dashing and debonair villain, but her frequent blunders always expose her as a poser.

Skills.Name: Hard-Boiled Shot
Skills.Desc: Fires a shot that deals <?1> damage to one enemy and explodes for an additional <?2> damage to enemies in a circular area around the target.

Skills.Name: Noir Attack
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, fires a shot that deals <?1> damage to one enemy with a 50% chance to explode for an additional <?2> damage to enemies in a circular area around the target.

Skills.Name: Noir Attack+
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, fires a shot that deals <?1> damage to one enemy with a 100% chance to explode for an additional <?2> damage to enemies in a circular area around the target.

Skills.Name: The Gravity of a Boss
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: The Gravity of a Boss+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Way of the Outlaw
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> for the duration of Aru's EX skill.

Weapon.Name: Wine Red/Admire
Weapon.Desc:
A semi-automatic sniper rifle with an antique design cherished by Aru.

Her hard-boiled nature intensifies just by carrying it.

Gear.Name: Aru's Very Precious Wallet
Gear.Desc: A high-quality wallet Aru loves. Although it's made of fine material, it's faded and scratched due to long use. Haruka, Kayoko, and Mutsuki saved up and gave it to Aru as a gift after Problem Solver 68 was first established, so it's irreplaceable to her.

Name: Eimi
CharacterSSRNew: How can I fight more effectively?
ProfileIntroduction:
An agent of the Super Phenomenon Task Force at the Millennium School.

An emotionally inscrutable oddball, Eimi very rarely speaks and can often be found staring off into space for no particular reason. However, there's no one as brutally efficient as her when it comes to carrying out missions for Seminar.

Skills.Name: Undying Will
Skills.Desc: Gains <b:DotHeal>, continuously restoring 3.4% of Eimi's lost HP plus <?1> of Healing every 1s for 20s.

Skills.Name: Single-Minded Assault
Skills.Desc: Every 15s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.

Skills.Name: Single-Minded Assault+
Skills.Desc: Every 15s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area and restores own HP by <?2> of Healing.

Skills.Name: Specialist's Respite
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealEffectiveness> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Specialist's Respite+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealEffectiveness> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Iron Will
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:OppressionResist> by <?1> while Eimi's HP is below 50%.

Weapon.Name: Multi Tactical
Weapon.Desc:
Eimi's favorite shotgun with a crude design.

Multifaceted like its name suggests, used on everything from forced breakthroughs to dealing with supernatural phenomena.

Gear.Name: Cute Cooling Fan
Gear.Desc:
Eimi's secret weapon against her greatest enemy: the heat.
It may be adorable, but this fan packs a strong blast. It doesn't reach very far, however, so gather close if you want to cool down.

Name: Haruna
CharacterSSRNew: Shall we explore the world of fine dining?
ProfileIntroduction:
President of the Gehenna Gourmet Research Society.

At a glance, she appears to possess the graceful charisma of a refined lady. But when it comes to food, she can turn into a deranged maniac at the flip of a switch. Despite her uncontrollable gluttony, she actually can't stomach too much food at once. Her favorite foods are those rich in fat, such as motsunabe and horumonyaki.

Skills.Name: Piercing Elegance
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a straight line. Damage to subsequent enemies is reduced by 10% per enemy hit (to a minimum of 30% damage).

Skills.Name: Exotic Explosives
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: Gourmand's Honor
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Gourmand's Honor+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Prudent Connoisseur
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> while Haruna is standing still.

Weapon.Name: Ideal
Weapon.Desc:
An elegant sniper rifle used by Haruna.

She claims she can see the path to becoming the ultimate gourmand through the scope.

Name: Hifumi
CharacterSSRNew: If Sensei's going to be with me...I'm going to give my all!
ProfileIntroduction:
A friendly, outgoing member of the Trinity Make-Up Work Club.

Hifumi's just a regular girl with average grades, but she's nonetheless well liked and popular for her well-rounded personality. She's a good listener for anyone who needs to vent about their worries or problems, but this also causes her to get swept up in the moment and unintentionally cause trouble.
Hobby: Peroro merch, shopping, listening to others

Skills.Name: Help Me, Peroro!
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area and summons a Peroro plush with 160% of Hifumi's <b:MAXHP>.

Skills.Name: Peroro's Support
Skills.Desc: Every 35s, deals 212% damage to one enemy and decrease their <d:HIT> by <?1> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Collector's Spirit
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Collector's Spirit+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Agile Collector
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CostRegen> by <?1> for 5s after Hifumi uses her EX skill.

Weapon.Name: My Necessity
Weapon.Desc:
A pink rifle carried around by Hifumi.

Hifumi doesn't go anywhere without this cute pink-painted rifle.

Name: Hina
CharacterSSRNew:
It's annoying, but I should take care of it.
That's my job.
ProfileIntroduction:
Head prefect of the Gehenna Academy Prefect Team.

Somewhat aloof and considers almost everything a bother and a chore, but is still every bit the head prefect of the Prefect Team when it comes to rules and regulations.
Her general response to most things is "Ugh, so annoying," but she's ruthless and decisive when it comes to matters on the battlefield.
Feared and respected by the enemies of Gehenna.

Skills.Name: Denouement: Ishbosheth
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.

Skills.Name: Lock & Load
Skills.Desc: Whenever Hina runs out of ammo, immediately reloads and increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 16s.

Skills.Name: Lock & Load+
Skills.Desc: Whenever Hina runs out of ammo, immediately reloads and increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 16s.

Skills.Name: Prefect Team Member Judgment
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Prefect Team Member Judgment+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and <b:AttackSpeed> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Out-and-Out
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage as an additional hit to enemies not taking cover.

Weapon.Name: Destroyer of Denouement
Weapon.Desc:
A multipurpose machine gun Hina wields as naturally as any limb.

Blows away school rule violators and degenerates with its ruthlessly destructive power.

Gear.Name: ヒナの風紀委員会の腕章
Gear.Desc: ヒナが普段身に着けている風紀委員会の腕章。誰かにとっては単に所属を示す物に過ぎないかもしれないが、ヒナにとっては風紀委員長としての責任感を想起させる物である。この腕章に込められた願いは決して軽いものではない。

Name: Hoshino
CharacterSSRNew:
It's way past my nap time,
but I'll help if you want me to.
ProfileIntroduction:
The Abydos Student Council vice president and president of the Foreclosure Task Force.

Acts more like a tired old timer and would rather play pranks than do actual work. This often gets her into trouble with her fellow task force members, but once on a mission, she fights harder on the front lines than anyone else to keep her friends safe.

Skills.Name: Tactical Suppression
Skills.Desc:
Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.
Each hit knocks back enemies a distance of <kb:1><?2>

Skills.Name: Emergency First Aid
Skills.Desc:
When HP falls below 30%, gains <b:DotHeal>, continuously restoring HP equal to <?1> of Healing every 4s for 20s.
(Activates once per battle.)

Skills.Name: Emergency First Aid+
Skills.Desc: When HP falls below 30%, gains , continuously restoring HP equal to of Healing every 4s for 20s and increases by for 20s. (Activates up to 2 times per battle.)

Skills.Name: Foreclosure Task Force President
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:DEF> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Foreclosure Task Force President+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:DEF> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Expert Suppression
Skills.Desc: Whenever Hoshino uses her EX skill, gains a <b:Shield> with HP equal to <?1> of Healing. Barrier is dispelled once EX skill has finished.

Weapon.Name: Eye of Horus
Weapon.Desc:
Hoshino's favorite shotgun with a simple design.

The normally lazy Hoshino never slacks when it comes to weapon maintenance.

Gear.Name: どこでも入場券
Gear.Desc: ホシノが「どこにいても夢の国に入れる」のだと主張する枕。とても柔らかくてふわふわしているが、今は生産中止してしまっているらしい。

Name: Iori
CharacterSSRNew: No mercy for criminals!
ProfileIntroduction:
A cold-blooded specialist of Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.

She uses her overwhelming force as field captain to ruthlessly discipline offenders. Iori is highly efficient and formidable in combat, but her stubbornness causes her to fall for even the most obvious traps.

Skills.Name: Major Roundup
Skills.Desc: Fires 3 shots at an enemy that each deal <?1> damage to the target and enemies in a fan-shaped area behind them.

Skills.Name: Bounty
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: One-Shot Bullseye
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HIT> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: One-Shot Bullseye+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HIT> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Prefect Team Nerve
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage as an additional hit to enemies if Iori is not taking cover.

Weapon.Name: Crack Shot
Weapon.Desc:
A sniper rifle used by Iori to deal with fugitives.

A bare-bones sniper rifle that lacks even a scope because, Iori says, a specialist never blames their tools.

Name: Maki
CharacterSSRNew: Art comes from the soul!
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of Veritas, a hacker group at Millennium Science School.

A mischievous student who enjoys drawing graffiti and designed Veritas' emblem. She has a flighty personality and doesn't take anything seriously, which often sparks conflict with other clubs.

Skills.Name: World Beautification!
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy and increases <b:ATK> by <?2> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Paintball Lob!
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, marks one enemy and decreases their <d:DEF> by <?1> for 15s.

Skills.Name: Dazzling Display
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Dazzling Display+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Suffering for Art
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage as an additional hit to enemies marked by Maki.

Weapon.Name: Auto Lacquer
Weapon.Desc:
Maki's multipurpose machine gun often used when drawing graffiti.

Modified using Millennium's technology, it can load and fire paintballs along with live ammunition.

Name: Neru
CharacterSSRNew: Shout! Give it everything you've got!
ProfileIntroduction:
President of C&C, a secret organization of the Millennium School.

At first glance, Neru looks like nothing but a young delinquent with a flashy bomber jacket draped over her maid outfit, but in reality she's Millennium's most formidable agent. Within Millennium, her call sign, Double O, is seen as a sign of certain victory.

Skills.Name: You Got a Death Wish or Somethin'?
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy. Damage increases by <?2> times if Neru is <s:Fury>.

Skills.Name: Cruisin' for a Bruisin'!
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, Neru becomes <s:Fury> and her <b:Dodge> increases by <?1> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Cruisin' for a Bruisin'!+
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, Neru becomes and her increases by for 20s. Improves the increase to EX Skill damage by an additional 0.3× while .

Skills.Name: Call Sign Double O
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Call Sign Double O+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Enhanced Rage
Skills.Desc: Whenever Neru becomes <s:Fury>, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 30s.

Weapon.Name: Twin Dragons
Weapon.Desc:
A pair of SMGs used by Neru.

Both are lavishly engraved with a golden dragon pattern.

Gear.Name: Neru's Bomber Jacket
Gear.Desc: A bomber jacket that Neru doesn't want to separate from for a single moment. If you ask her about it, she has a very simple answer for you...

Name: Izumi
CharacterSSRNew: The world is full of delicious food!
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the Gehenna Gourmet Research Society with a voracious appetite.

She loves food so much that she even gobbles up dishes that others would dislike with gusto.

Skills.Name: Cheese 'n' Chocolate Hamburger!
Skills.Desc: Restores own HP by <?1> of Healing<?2>.

Skills.Name: Ready, Set, Boom!
Skills.Desc: Whenever Izumi uses normal attacks, she has a 20% chance to deal <?1> damage to one enemy. 10s cooldown between activations.

Skills.Name: Ready, Set, Boom!+
Skills.Desc: Whenever Izumi uses normal attacks, she has a 20% chance to deal <?1> damage to one enemy. 10s cooldown between activations.

Skills.Name: What to Eat Next?
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealEffectiveness> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: What to Eat Next?+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealEffectiveness> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Savor the Flavor!
Skills.Desc: Deals between <?1> ~ <?2> damage as an additional hit to enemies based on Izumi's current HP.

Weapon.Name: Daily Cutlery
Weapon.Desc:
A heavy machine gun used by Izumi.

The more troublemakers the gun defeats, the more delicious her food becomes.

Gear.Name: Lucky Hot Dog
Gear.Desc:
This 3D-printed hot dog is so realistic, you think you can almost smell the mustard.
Izumi swears this plastic hot dog is lucky and brings her to good food every time she carries it with her. We're not sure if the bite marks are part of the design or if Izumi took a bite...

Name: Shiroko
CharacterSSRNew: Do you need my help?
ProfileIntroduction:
The sporty field captain of the Abydos Foreclosure Task Force.

A girl of few words and almost no facial expression, Shiroko gives the impression of being frigid and emotionless. In truth, she is more devoted to Abydos High School than anything else. If it's for the sake of revitalizing the academy, she'll do whatever it takes and sometimes propose some outlandish ideas herself.

Skills.Name: Drone Support
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: Grenade Lob
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: Grenade Lob+
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: Target Weaknesses
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Target Weaknesses+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Very Rapid Fire
Skills.Desc: Normal attacks have a 20% chance to increase <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> for 30s. 25s cooldown between activations.

Weapon.Name: White Fang 465
Weapon.Desc:
Shiroko's favorite assault rifle.

Always ready to be used in any situation due to diligent maintenance.

Gear.Name: Shiroko's Drone
Gear.Desc: A drone that Shiroko always has on standby. She claims it is for filming herself exercising, but there are many upgrades attached that seem to serve other purposes.

Name: Shun
CharacterSSRNew: Have you been waiting patiently for me? My, you're such a good kid.
ProfileIntroduction:
Instructor of Shanhaijing's Disciplinary Support Department, Plum Blossom Garden.

An instructor to young students at the Plum Blossom Garden. The little students hold her and Shanhaijing in high regard. She is seldom angered by the mischievous antics of her young students due to her extensive experience. However, asking her age is off limits.

Skills.Name: Where Did You Go, You Rascals?
Skills.Desc: Augments <s:FormChange> to deal 153% damage and prioritize the enemy with the highest ATK, increases <b:Range> by 24.2% and <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>, but decreases <d:AttackSpeed> by 18.8% for 30s.

Skills.Name: Pay Attention, Everyone!
Skills.Desc: Generates <?1> units of skill cost once at the start of battle.

Skills.Name: Instructor's Poise
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Instructor's Poise+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Plum Blossom Training
Skills.Desc: Deals damage as an additional hit to medium sized enemies.

Weapon.Name: Halcon de Amor
Weapon.Desc:
A sniper rifle inlaid with Shun's favorite pattern.

Any naughty child becomes obedient in front of Shun's Tough Love.

Name: Sumire
CharacterSSRNew: Shall we start today's training?
ProfileIntroduction:
Leader of the Millennium Athletic Training Club.

An athletic girl with a passion for physical training. She is very much a jock and believes all problems can be solved with muscles and exercise.

Skills.Name: Shoot and Score
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.

Skills.Name: Warm-Up
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Warm-Up+
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 20s and <b:DEF> by <?2> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Pinpoint Attack
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Pinpoint Attack+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Tension Boost!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:DEF> by <?1> while not inflicted with a Crowd Control effect.

Weapon.Name: Modern Millennium Dumbbell
Weapon.Desc:
A semi-automatic shotgun that Sumire uses regularly when exercising.

Can improve one's health by doing a push-up with each shot fired.

Gear.Name: Mobile Sandbag
Gear.Desc: A sandbag shaped like a gaiter that can be worn around an arm or leg. It's filled with not just sand but also iron powder, making it much heavier than it looks.

Name: Tsurugi
CharacterSSRNew: It's time to hunt!
ProfileIntroduction:
President of Trinity's Justice Task Force and its official secret weapon.

She is belligerent and violent, with a tendency to destroy anything she doesn't like. However, thanks to the painstaking efforts of the task force's vice president, Hasumi, the club has managed to hold itself together. Tsurugi is like a beast that can't be controlled, but even she can't help but soften up when she's with her Sensei.

Skills.Name: Bizarre Devastation
Skills.Desc: Immediately reloads, augments <s:FormChange> to deal 138% damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area and increases <b:ATK> by <?1>. Effect ends after Tsurugi reloads <?2>. (Normal Attack changes to hit 2 times)

Skills.Name: Intense Passion
Skills.Desc: Whenever Tsurugi defeats an enemy, restores own HP by <?1> of Healing. 10s cooldown between activations.

Skills.Name: Intense Passion+
Skills.Desc: Whenever Tsurugi defeats an enemy, restores own HP by <?1> of Healing and increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?2> for 20s. Also knocks back all nearby enemies a distance of <kb:1>. 10s cooldown between activations.

Skills.Name: Agility
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MoveSpeed> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Agility+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AmmoCount> by <?1> and <b:MoveSpeed> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Uncontrollable Power
Skills.Desc: Whenever Tsurugi defeats an enemy, she has a <?1> chance to restore 1 ammo to her weapon.

Weapon.Name: Blood 'n' Gunpowder
Weapon.Desc:
Twin shotguns used by Tsurugi.

One is named "Blood" and the other is named "Gunpowder."
Both are equally terrifying, with no particular distinction between them.

Gear.Name: Tsurugi's Special Chest
Gear.Desc: A box full of goods hiding deep inside Tsurugi's room. Various, random things are piled up in it: collectibles, books, movie tickets, and more. You can get a glimpse of Tsurugi's meticulousness just by looking at how neatly everything's organized, without a single speck of dust.

Name: Akane
ProfileIntroduction: An agent of C&C, a secret organization of the Millennium School. Akane operates under the call sign Zero-Three. She became known as the Master Cleaner for her modus operandi of infiltrating the enemy camp and clearing it out with explosives, all while wearing her signature gentle smile.

Skills.Name: Elegant Removal
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy and decreases their <d:DEF> by <?2> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Elegant Infiltration
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: Agile Advancement
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MoveSpeed> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Agile Advancement+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1> and <b:MoveSpeed> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Total Suppression
Skills.Desc: Attacks have a 10% chance to decrease the target's <d:Dodge> by <?1> for 30s. 5s cooldown between activations.

Weapon.Name: Silent Solution
Weapon.Desc:
A pistol that Akane always carries with her.

It contrasts with the explosives she usually uses, AKA the "Noisy Solution".

Name: Chise
ProfileIntroduction:
A spacey girl who is a member of the Hyakkiyako Academy's Yin-Yang Club.

Extremely fond of traditional activities such as writing haiku, which led her to join the Yin-Yang Club. Her exotic looks and presence have made her the envy of her peers at Hyakkiyako, but she seems completely oblivious to that fact.

Skills.Name: You Might Get a Boo-Boo!
Skills.Desc: Creates a circular zone that continuously deals <?1> damage to enemies inside it every 1s for 10s.

Skills.Name: I'm Gonna Shoot!
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: I'm Gonna Shoot!+
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: Put Your Back Into It!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Put Your Back Into It!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: This Is Gonna Sting!
Skills.Desc: Normal attacks have a 10% chance to inflict <d:Burn>, continuously dealing <?1> damage every 4s for 20s. 5s cooldown between activations.

Weapon.Name: Type 575 Grenade Launcher
Weapon.Desc:
A multiple grenade launcher owned by Chise.

Each shell has a haiku that Chise painstakingly wrote.
It is currently on sale at the Yin-Yang Club.

Gear.Name: 風が来る音
Gear.Desc: チセが吊るしておいた風鈴。チセが待つ清らかな青い音は、涼しい風が来る合図だそうだ。

Name: Akari
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the Gehenna Gourmet Research Society.

Don't let her charming appearance fool you. A glutton with a massive appetite, she's the reigning champion of various competitive eating contests across Kivotos. She possesses a mild-mannered and kind personality, but she can prank as well as any other student at Gehenna Academy.

Skills.Name: One Heaping Helping of Grenades!
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: One More Spicy Serving!
Skills.Desc: Normal attacks have a 10% chance to increase <b:ATK> by <?1> for 20s. 15s cooldown between activations.

Skills.Name: Thanks for the Great Meal!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Thanks for the Great Meal!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: I Still Got Room for More!
Skills.Desc: Normal attacks have a 10% chance to increase <b:ATK> by <?1> for 26s. 18s cooldown between activations.

Weapon.Name: Mark of Gluttony
Weapon.Desc:
Akari's favorite assault rifle.

This greedy glutton's assault rifle has various firearm accessories, including a grenade launcher.

Name: Hasumi
ProfileIntroduction:
The second-in-command of Trinity's Justice Task Force.

Hasumi also acts as the task force's tactical commander on behalf of the wild and ferocious club president, Tsurugi. She may seem like any other ordinary Trinity student, but make no mistake, she's a Justice Task Force member through and through. At times she'll do incredibly reckless things with absolute calm.

Skills.Name: Armor-Piercing Shot
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: Shrewd
Skills.Desc: Whenever Hasumi defeats an enemy, immediately reloads and increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> for 13s.

Skills.Name: Precision Aim
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Precision Aim+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Target Search
Skills.Desc: Whenever Hasumi reloads, increases the <b:CriticalChance> of the next attack by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Impalement
Weapon.Desc:
Hasumi's favorite sniper rifle.

Its sleek, old-fashioned appearance and fierce power are not unlike its owner.

Name: Nonomi
CharacterSSRNew: Finally, it's time for me to make my move!
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the Abydos Foreclosure Task Force.

A friendly, pleasant girl that provides the Foreclosure Task Force with much-needed emotional support to balance out the extreme personalities of its other members. Though she doesn't show it, she comes from a wealthy family and pays for nearly all of the Foreclosure Task Force's snacks out of her own pocket.

Skills.Name: Punishment Time!
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.

Skills.Name: Ta-da! ☆
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Ta-da! ☆+
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and <b:HIT> by <?2> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Tsk-Tsk, Shame on You!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Tsk-Tsk, Shame on You!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Squeaky-Clean Sweep
Skills.Desc: Deals damage as an additional hit to large sized enemies.

Weapon.Name: Mini No. 5
Weapon.Desc:
A machine gun used by Nonomi.

Contrary to its name, Mini No. 5 is anything but light.

Gear.Name: 秘密のウィッシュリスト
Gear.Desc: ノノミがこっそり記入していたノート。いつか対策委員会のメンバーたちと一緒にしたいことが書かれている。

Name: Kayoko
ProfileIntroduction:
The department head of Problem Solver 68.

Often mistaken for a rough-and-tumble delinquent due to her naturally intimidating appearance, but unlike the rest of Problem Solver 68, she holds no ill will toward anyone. Kayoko opts not to say anything about these misunderstandings, but this only adds to the perception that she's someone to be feared.

Skills.Name: Panic Bringer
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area around Kayoko and inflicts <c:Fear> for <?2>.

Skills.Name: Panic Shot
Skills.Desc: Every 20s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy with a 30% chance to inflict <c:Fear> for 3.6s.

Skills.Name: Scary Face
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:OppressionPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Scary Face+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:OppressionPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Oh, Well...
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage as an additional hit to enemies inflicted with a Crowd Control effect.

Weapon.Name: Demon's Roar
Weapon.Desc:
A handgun that Kayoko always carries.

Kayoko uses a silencer when indoors as it makes a loud roaring noise every time it's fired.

Name: Mutsuki
ProfileIntroduction:
Problem Solver 68's resident go-getter and chief of staff.

Unlike Aru, who has a semblance of a conscience, Mutsuki is a devilish troublemaker who relishes in committing acts of mayhem. As one of her oldest friends, Mutsuki understands Aru's bravado best, even if she doesn't exactly always play along.

Skills.Name: Scorching Serenade
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in 3 circular areas.

Skills.Name: Explosive Aria
Skills.Desc: Every 20s, places 3 mines a fixed distance in front of Mutsuki that each deal <?1> damage if triggered. Mines last for 15s.

Skills.Name: Let's Have Some Fun!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Let's Have Some Fun!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Wanna Have Some Fun?
Skills.Desc: Normal attacks have a 25% chance to increase <b:HIT> by <?1> for 30s. 25s cooldown between activations.

Weapon.Name: Trick or Trick
Weapon.Desc:
A multipurpose machine gun that Mutsuki always carries.

Firepower is an important component of fun pranks according to Mutsuki.

Name: Junko
ProfileIntroduction:
Resident glutton of the Gehenna Gourmet Research Society.

Though Junko's more of a conventional gastronome compared to the other binge-eating, frankenfood-gobbling members of the Gourmet Research Society, she still goes hog wild when presented with a scrumptious delicacy.

Skills.Name: I'm Hangry!
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a straight line and sacrifices 25.7% of her current HP.

Skills.Name: Don't Talk to Me When I'm Hungry!
Skills.Desc: Once per battle, when Junko's HP falls below 20%, she becomes <s:Immortal> for <?1>.

Skills.Name: Don't Talk to Me When I'm Hungry!+
Skills.Desc: Once per battle, when Junko's HP falls below 20%, she becomes for and reduces the for her next two EX Skill uses by 4.

Skills.Name: Tiny Advantage
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:Dodge> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Tiny Advantage+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:Dodge> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Hungry Foodie
Skills.Desc: Deals between <?1> ~ <?2> damage as an additional hit to enemies based on Junko's missing HP.

Weapon.Name: Diner's Outlaw
Weapon.Desc:
A pair of machine guns used by Junko.

Junko can take over the dining table anytime and anywhere as long as she has these machine guns with their incredible rate of fire.

Gear.Name: Food Tour Notepad
Gear.Desc: A notepad used by Junko. It's a special journal in which she records the scores of every great restaurant she has been to, organized by area.

Name: Serika
ProfileIntroduction:
The conscientious treasurer of the Abydos Foreclosure Task Force.

Serika nags a lot and does not hesitate to let her opinions be known. Despite her habit of bashing the academy, saying, "To hell with this academy!" she is secretly quite devoted to it and even works part-time jobs to try and help pay off the academy's debts.

Skills.Name: Outta My Way!
Skills.Desc: Immediately reloads and increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Focused Fire
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: Focused Fire+
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: Part-Time Worker's Spirit
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Part-Time Worker's Spirit+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Wrath of the Task Force
Skills.Desc: Whenever Serika uses her EX skill, increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> for 30s.

Weapon.Name: Sincerity
Weapon.Desc:
An assault rifle that Serika carries with her whenever she goes to work part time.

Always carefully maintained, revealing Serika's meticulousness and sincerity.

Gear.Name: Serika's Sports Bag
Gear.Desc: Serika's black sports bag. This versatile accessory is great for school, working out, and more... It can carry just about anything.

Name: Tsubaki
ProfileIntroduction:
President of Hyakkiyako Academy's Inner Discipline Club.

Her motivation for training regularly is to attain "a more comfortable and restful sleep." Thanks to her diligent training, she is able to sleep while sitting, standing, or even while eating. Her prowess earned her the nickname "Sleeping Beauty." Though she seems to be constantly on the verge of nodding off, at night she takes to the streets to keep them safe.

Skills.Name: Deploy Tactical Shield
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:DEF> by <?1> for 30s and inflicts <c:Provoke> on enemies in a circular area around Tsubaki for <?2>.

Skills.Name: Sleep Cures All
Skills.Desc: When HP falls below 30%, restores own HP by <?1> of Healing once per battle.

Skills.Name: Fortitude
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:DEF> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Fortitude+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> and <b:DEF> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Expert Reload
Skills.Desc: Decreases <b:DamagedRatio> by <?1> while reloading.

Weapon.Name: Sleeping Companion Ⅱ
Weapon.Desc:
A submachine gun used by Tsubaki.

Tsubaki chose a smaller model to prevent it from interfering with her daily training.
For reference, Sleeping Companion I is a pillow inside her shield.

Name: Yuuka
ProfileIntroduction:
The treasurer of Seminar, the student council of Millennium Science School.

Yuuka has a mathematical acumen that is notable even among Millennium's high ratio of STEM students. She oversees the entirety of Millennium's budget. Her special talent is the abacus, and she has a habit of fiddling with the beads when dealing with emotional or mental conflicts.

Skills.Name: Q.E.D.
Skills.Desc: Gains a <b:Shield> with HP equal to <?1> of Healing lasting up to <?2>.

Skills.Name: I.F.F.
Skills.Desc: Every 15s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: I.F.F+
Skills.Desc: Every 15s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and increases <b:Dodge> by <?2> for 10s.

Skills.Name: Optimal Solution
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:DEF> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Optimal Solution+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:BlockRate> by <?1> and <b:DEF> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Speedy Mental Calculations
Skills.Desc: Whenever Yuuka takes cover, restores own HP by <?1> of Healing. 10s cooldown between activations.

Weapon.Name: Logic & Reason
Weapon.Desc:
A pair of machine guns used by Yuuka.

They help Yuuka make rational and intelligent decisions.

Gear.Name: Yuuka's Scientific Calculator
Gear.Desc: A scientific calculator Yuuka is never seen without. Despite her excellent mental arithmetic skills, Yuuka always double checks her calculations to ensure perfection.

Name: Haruka
ProfileIntroduction:
A senior member of Problem Solver 68.

Her gloomy personality has made her the target of bullies since childhood. Only recently was Aru able to help her put a stop to the harassment. Since then, she has been the youngest senior member of Problem Solver 68. She may be timid and have painfully low self-esteem, but may also be the most terrifying member of her club because of her ideas alone.

Skills.Name: Shotgun Blast
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.

Skills.Name: Over Trigger
Skills.Desc: Every 20s, increases <b:DEF> by <?1> for 20s.

Skills.Name: I'll Keep My Chin Up!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: I'll Keep My Chin Up!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Hauugh?!
Skills.Desc: Whenever Haruka takes damage, she has a 5% chance to increase <b:DEF> by <?1> for 15s. 10s cooldown between activations.

Weapon.Name: Blow Away
Weapon.Desc:
A shotgun Haruka uses to exterminate pests.

Or uses to exterminate "pest-like things".

Name: Asuna
ProfileIntroduction:
An agent of C&C, a secret organization of the Millennium School.

Armed with brutal instinct and intuition, Asuna is a seasoned veteran who has successfully overcome countless challenges under the call sign Zero-One. She is also something of a loose cannon, doing things such as revealing her identity on secret missions and smashing anything that looks suspicious without a second thought. However, she always manages to produce great results in the end.

Skills.Name: On My Way!
Skills.Desc: Dashes forward in the specified direction, increasing <b:Dodge> by 43.4% for the duration of the dash and <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> for 30s.

Skills.Name: I'll Fire!
Skills.Desc: Every 20s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: This Is Gonna Hurt
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: This Is Gonna Hurt+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Wanna Pick Up the Pace?
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by a further <?1> for 30s after Asuna uses her EX skill.

Weapon.Name: Surprise Party
Weapon.Desc:
An assault rifle used by Asuna.

The name suggests lively gatherings, but as usual, she can't remember where it came from.

Name: Kotori
ProfileIntroduction:
Member of the Engineering Department at Millennium Science School.

A chatterbox who loves discussing topics such as physics and mechanics. She's always the first one at the scene to explain what's happening whenever there's a machinery-related problem at Millennium.

Skills.Name: Box of Answers
Skills.Desc: Repositions up to 4 allies in a circular area to the selected location and grants them a <b:Shield> with HP equal to <?1> of Healing lasting up to 13s.

Skills.Name: Pardon!
Skills.Desc: Every 35s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.

Skills.Name: Getting the Point
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Getting the Point+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Roger That, Crystal Clear!
Skills.Desc: Whenever Kotori defeats an enemy, increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> for 30s.

Weapon.Name: Professor K
Weapon.Desc:
A machine gun Kotori carries. Also known as EX-Plain.

When asked about its name, Kotori begins by talking about the history of firearm development.

Name: Suzumi
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the Vigilante Crew responsible for protecting Trinity's students.

To combat the increasing number of attacks on Trinity's students at the hands of the other academies, Suzumi volunteered to patrol the streets to abate attackers. Often misunderstood as cold and unfeeling due to her strong sense of justice, she actually has a friendly side as well.

Skills.Name: Holy Flash Grenade
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area<?2>.

Skills.Name: Ranger's Endurance
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: Ranger's Endurance+
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and inflicts <c:Stunned> for 3s.

Skills.Name: Urgent Evasion
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:Dodge> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Urgent Evasion+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:Dodge> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Ranger's Assault
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage as an additional hit to enemies inflicted with a Crowd Control effect.

Weapon.Name: Safety
Weapon.Desc:
Suzumi's assault rifle.

A precious companion for Suzumi, who always patrols the neighborhood alone.

Gear.Name: Patrol Headphones
Gear.Desc: The headphones Suzumi carries on patrol. Calling them "Patrol Headphones" is a bit self-indulgent as they are a relatively common product.

Name: Pina
ProfileIntroduction:
A devout vigilante admirer attending Hyakkiyako Academy.

Pina has a bubbly, energetic personality and takes pleasure in helping others. Everything she knows about vigilantes comes from movies, so the accuracy of said knowledge can be somewhat dubious. Nonetheless, she persists in her ambition of becoming a vigilante herself.

Skills.Name: Rapid Fire Mode!
Skills.Desc: Immediately reloads, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and normal attacks will ignore delay <?2> times for 30s.

Skills.Name: Burn it Again!
Skills.Desc: When HP falls below 20%, restores own HP by <?1> of Healing once per battle.

Skills.Name: Keen Senses
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Keen Senses+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Ready, Set, Spray!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> after standing still for 10s.

Weapon.Name: Indiscriminate Shooter
Weapon.Desc:
Pina's stationary machine gun.

The non-stop heat it emits is as fiery as Pina's own heart.

Name: Hibiki
CharacterSSRNew: Have anything that needs fixing?
ProfileIntroduction:
Member of the Engineering Department at Millennium Science School.

Socially inept and inarticulate compared to other students, but is a prolific inventor due to her innate talent for engineering. Her inventions are considered to be flawless masterpieces, but they often come equipped with baffling and obscure functions.

Skills.Name: This Is Gonna Hurt
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in 5 circular areas.

Skills.Name: Ample Firepower
Skills.Desc: Every 20s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area centered on the enemy with the lowest HP.

Skills.Name: Might Be Dangerous
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Might Be Dangerous+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:Stability> by <?1> and <b:CriticalDamage> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Hope That Helps
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Fancy Light
Weapon.Desc:
Hibiki's favorite mortar.

For experiments, she uses it to fire other random things that aren't shells.

Name: Karin
CharacterSSRNew: As you wish, Master.
ProfileIntroduction:
An agent of C&C, a secret organization from Millennium Science School.

She's in charge of providing rear fire support under the call sign Zero-Two. Despite her intimidating appearance, she is the most cautious of C&C's agents and often ends up having to reel in Asuna and Akane when they get out of control during missions.

Skills.Name: Target Removal
Skills.Desc: Deals damage to one enemy. If the enemy is extra-large sized, deals an additional damage.

Skills.Name: Supporting Fire
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy with a 50% chance to inflict <c:Stunned> for 3.1s.

Skills.Name: Weapon Upgrade
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Weapon Upgrade+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Ally Reinforcement
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Big Eye
Weapon.Desc:
A massive sniper rifle used exclusively by Karin.

She can even accurately shoot down flying targets with it.

Name: Saya
CharacterSSRNew: Leave the experiments to me!
ProfileIntroduction:
A genius inventor of Shanhaijing Academy.

A prodigy who earned six degrees while still in elementary school. However, she's known more for the way she causes trouble for others through her unruly antics than for her genius. She's always accompanied by her rat, Nezusuke, whom she's known since childhood and regards as family.

Skills.Name: Voila, My Masterpiece!
Skills.Desc: Creates a circular zone that continuously deals <?1> damage to enemies inside it every 1s for 8s.

Skills.Name: A New Experiment!
Skills.Desc: Every 20s, decreases the <d:CriticalChance> of enemies in a circular area by 12.1% for 20s and inflicts them with <d:Poison>, continuously dealing <?1> damage every 4s for 20s.

Skills.Name: I Am the Greatest!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: I Am the Greatest!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: I've Got This!
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: The Great I's Pistol
Weapon.Desc:
A custom-made pistol that Saya modified herself.

It is also often used to give shots to Nezusuke.

Name: Airi
ProfileIntroduction:
A cheerful member of the Trinity After-School Sweets Club.

Has a relaxed and easy-going personality and cherishes the time she spends sampling desserts and chatting with her friends. Her favorite dessert is ice cream, and she's recently gotten hooked on mint chocolate chip.
Hobby: Checking out dessert shops, tea parties.

Skills.Name: If I Have To
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area and creates a circular zone in which enemies have decreased <d:MoveSpeed> by 22.8% <?2> for 20s.

Skills.Name: You Might See Stars!
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, decreases the <d:AttackSpeed> of one enemy by <?1> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Dessert Power
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Dessert Power+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Airi's Encouragement
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Sweet Dessert
Weapon.Desc:
Airi's SMG.

The name is taken from one of the desserts at a shop she frequents.

Name: Fuuka
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the School Lunch Club that manages Gehenna Academy's dining hall.

A kind and earnest student, making her a bit of a rarity at Gehenna. She prepares and serves hundreds of meals every morning for the students of Gehenna. She's a good cook, but her skills are written off due to the dining hall's lack of manpower. Still, she refuses to give up and is constantly looking for ways to improve the menu.
Hobby: Cooking homestyle dishes, packing bento lunches

Skills.Name: Lunchtime!
Skills.Desc: Repositions up to 4 allies in a circular area to the selected location and restores their HP by <?1> of Healing.

Skills.Name: Gift of the School Lunch Club
Skills.Desc: Every 20s, increases the <b:DEF> of the ally with the highest Max HP by <?1> for 16s.

Skills.Name: Fresh Ingredients!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Fresh Ingredients!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Pride of the School Lunch Club
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalChanceResistPoint> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Lunch Club Defense Gun Type A
Weapon.Desc:
A submachine gun Fuuka carries everywhere.

It was originally intended to control the occasional troublemakers in the dining hall, but those troublemakers usually quiet down before Fuuka gets to use it.

Name: Hanae
ProfileIntroduction:
A cheerful and energetic first-year member of the Trinity Remedial Knights.

Hanae has a vivacious personality and a positive outlook on life, but when she sees a patient, she can get too worked up and often actually worsens their condition. She's a bit odd at times, but patients under her care seem to recover more quickly regardless of their affliction.

Skills.Name: Time for Your Treatment!
Skills.Desc: Grants <b:DotHeal> to one ally, continuously restoring HP equal to <?1> of Healing every 4s for 20s.

Skills.Name: Don't Fall!
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, increases the <b:DEF> of the ally with the lowest HP by <?1> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Medical Mastery
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Medical Mastery+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Break a Leg, Everyone!
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Happy Smile Gun
Weapon.Desc:
An assault rifle that Hanae uses when examining patients.

This rifle brings a happy smile to any patient that sees it.

Name: Hare
ProfileIntroduction:
An engineer of Veritas, the hacker group of Millennium Science School.

An unprecedented genius even amongst the brilliant minds at Millennium. Most of the school's cutting-edge technology was developed by her. Even with all these achievements, she remains humble, friendly, and considerate towards her peers.

Skills.Name: EMP Drone Launch
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area and inflicts <c:Stunned> for <?2>.

Skills.Name: Sabotage: Plan A
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, decreases the <d:HealEffectiveness> of one enemy by <?1> for 15s.

Skills.Name: Sabotage: Plan A+
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, decreases the <d:HealEffectiveness> of one enemy by <?1> for 25s.

Skills.Name: Enhanced Arms: Plan B
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Enhanced Arms: Plan B+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Interception System Ops
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:Dodge> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Auto Aimer
Weapon.Desc:
An assault rifle used by Hare.

Equipped with various cutting-edge features such as automatic target aiming, but Hare never seems to use them.

Gear.Name: Athena-3
Gear.Desc: A spherical drone that always follows Hare around. Named after the goddess of wisdom, it's equipped with artificial intelligence that can experience and learn on its own, but it often works against the intentions of Hare in unexpected ways.

Name: Utaha
ProfileIntroduction:
President of the Engineering Department at Millennium Science School.

Has invented a variety of robots, if only to stake her claim to the title of president of the Engineering Department. Her pet robot Thundergun has been determined to possess combat capabilities equivalent to a hundred PMC combat automata.

Skills.Name: Rise of Thundergun
Skills.Desc: Summons a turret with <?1> of Utaha's <b:ATK> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Thundergun MK-II
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, summons a turret with <?1> of Utaha's <b:ATK> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Thundergun MK-II+
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, summons 3 turrets, each with <?1> of Utaha's <b:ATK> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Tech Revolution
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Tech Revolution+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Meister's Pledge
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Meister Zero
Weapon.Desc:
A submachine gun with a simple design that Utaha modified herself.

Can also be used as a substitute for tools, such as a hammer, thanks to its strong durability.

Gear.Name: A Meister's Toolbox
Gear.Desc:
A set of tools in a custom toolbox, assembled and organized to Utaha's preferences.
It's very likely that this set, made and maintained with a meister's pride, has no equal in all of Kivotos.

Name: Ayane
ProfileIntroduction:
The diligent secretary of the Abydos Foreclosure Task Force.

A hard-working stickler for rules and regulations, she does her best to contribute to the revitalization of Abydos High School.

Skills.Name: Special Delivery: Combat Supplies
Skills.Desc: Restores the HP of allies in a circular area by <?1> of Healing.

Skills.Name: Scholastic Support
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, increases the <b:CriticalChanceResistPoint> of allies in a circular area by <?1> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Self-Development
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Self-Development+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Morale Boost
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Common Sense
Weapon.Desc:
A cute pistol.

You will hardly ever see this pistol as long as you speak and act with common sense in front of Ayane.

Name: Chinatsu
ProfileIntroduction:
She is in charge of medical aid at Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.

Chinatsu is one of the few people with common sense among the obsessively dogmatic Prefect Team. She's usually the one who prevents other members like Ako and Iori from running amok. Her tone can be harsh and give the impression of being just as cold as any other member of the Prefect Team, but she is actually a sweet young girl who melts at the sight of cute animals.

Skills.Name: Tactical First Aid
Skills.Desc: Restores the HP of one ally by <?1> of Healing<?2>.

Skills.Name: Regroup
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, increases the <b:Dodge> of the ally with the lowest HP by <?1> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Reinforced Medical Enhancement
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Reinforced Medical Enhancement+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Reinforced Defenses
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:DEF> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Support Pointer
Weapon.Desc:
Chinatsu's favorite pistol.

It is more often used to point at something than to shoot someone.

Name: Kotama
ProfileIntroduction:
A hacker of Veritas, Millennium Science School's infamous hacking group.

Wiretapping is her specialty, and she takes great pleasure in eavesdropping on other people's private conversations. A socially awkward young lady who addresses even younger students with formal deference. In real life, she's mousy and shy, but on the internet she's a surprisingly glib wordsmith.

Skills.Name: Commence Wiretap
Skills.Desc: Increases the <b:ATK> of all allies in a circular area by <?1> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Tap Vulnerabilities
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and decreases their <d:ATK> by 18.9% for 20s.

Skills.Name: Intensive Analysis
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HIT> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Intensive Analysis+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HIT> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: EM Wave Diffusion
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Echo Link
Weapon.Desc:
A pistol that Kotama always carries around.

This model has minimized noise when firing to prevent it from interfering while listening in on wiretaps.

Name: Juri
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the School Lunch Club that manages Gehenna Academy's dining hall.

Like Fuuka, she's a hard worker who pours her heart and soul into cooking meals for the other students. However, her cooking is so bad that it's grotesque, so her efforts are ultimately useless. But she continues to strive to hopefully improve her cooking under Fuuka's encouragement and guidance.

Skills.Name: Juri's Cooking Time!
Skills.Desc: Repositions up to 4 enemies in a circular area to the selected location and inflicts them with <d:Poison>, continuously dealing <?1> damage every 4s for 20s.

Skills.Name: Peak Culinary Effort
Skills.Desc: Every 20s, decreases the <d:AttackSpeed> of the enemy with the highest ATK by <?1> for 16s.

Skills.Name: Extreme Zeal!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Extreme Zeal!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Juri's Mealtime!
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Lunch Club Defense Gun Type B
Weapon.Desc:
A shotgun carried by Juri.

Originally intended to control the troublemakers in the dining hall,
but for some reason, Juri uses it as a cooking tool.

Name: Serina
ProfileIntroduction:
A kind-hearted girl affiliated with the Trinity Remedial Knights.

A virtuous person who enjoys charity work, her concern for the health of those around her has earned her a reputation as a sort of mother hen. Despite having a somewhat timid personality and avoiding quarrels and conflict, she is always ready to stand up against enemies who threaten the peace.

Skills.Name: Intensive Care Set A
Skills.Desc: Repositions the closest ally to the selected location and restores their HP by <?1> of Healing.

Skills.Name: Urgent Rescue Set B
Skills.Desc: Every 35s, restores the HP of the ally with the lowest HP for <?1> of Healing.

Skills.Name: Ministering Angel
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Ministering Angel+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Guardian Angel's Smile
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:OppressionResist> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Tactical Therapy
Weapon.Desc:
Serina's special assault rifle.

Pulling the trigger injects shots, but not the kind that heal.

Name: Shimiko
ProfileIntroduction:
Librarian of the Trinity Library Committee.

A bookworm and a bibliophile, she is one of the few students who has read every single tome in Trinity Library. She loves recommending books as much as she does reading them, and has a habit of making book recommendations to people she's just met based on their preferences.

Skills.Name: Shield of Knowledge
Skills.Desc: Deploys cover with HP equal to a set amount <?1>and increases the <b:DEF> of allies in a circular area around it by <?2> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Food for the Soul
Skills.Desc: Every 35s, grants a <b:Shield> with HP equal to <?1> of Healing to the ally with the lowest HP lasting up to 16s.

Skills.Name: Time to Gain Some Knowledge!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Time to Gain Some Knowledge!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Study While You Can!
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:DEF> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Library Ruler
Weapon.Desc:
A rifle used by Shimiko.

It's her reliable disciplinary sidekick for when things get rowdy in the library.

Name: Yoshimi
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the Trinity After-School Sweets Club.

A girl with a height complex that gives off the impression of a small, angry animal. Constantly fixated on appearing more mature, her tendency to wear her heart on her sleeve gets her into trouble. She can't help but smile widely when visiting dessert cafes to sample the latest limited-edition treats.

Skills.Name: I-I'm Not Worried!
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area, knocks them back a distance of <kb:1> and inflicts <c:Stunned> for <?2>.

Skills.Name: You Wanna Get Burned?!
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: You Wanna Get Burned?!+
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area and decreases their <d:OppressionResist> by <?2> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Don't Underestimate Me!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Don't Underestimate Me!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: E-Everyone, Please Listen!
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:OppressionPower> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Sweet Driver
Weapon.Desc:
Yoshimi's exclusive rifle.

The dessert competitions in Kivotos are often accompanied by strong force.

Gear.Name: スイーツ・ハンター
Gear.Desc: ヨシミ専用のフォークスプーン。いざという時に即座に対応できるよう、常に懐に置いている。長い間使い続けられる名品のようだ。

Name: Mashiro
CharacterSSRNew: Where do you need justice dispensed?
ProfileIntroduction:
A devoted member of Trinity General School's Justice Task Force.

Armed with a massive sniper rifle that towers over her, Mashiro stoically provides fire support.Though not much one for words, she isn't shy or socially inept and actually becomes quite talkative when it comes to justice.

Skills.Name: Strike of Justice
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy with a <?2> chance of dealing an additional <?3> damage.

Skills.Name: Righteous Justice
Skills.Desc: Every 20s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: Breath of Justice
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Breath of Justice+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HIT> by <?1> and <b:CriticalChance> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Binding Justice
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:HIT> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Manifestation of Justice
Weapon.Desc:
A sniper rifle that Mashiro uses to carry out her duties in the Justice Task Force.

Although it's a bit bulky to carry around, Mashiro claims it doesn't deter her faith in justice.

Name: Izuna
CharacterSSRNew: Anything for my lord!
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the Hyakkiyako Academy's Ninjutsu Research Club.

A bright and bubbly young girl, but her devotion to her strange dream has caused her to spend most of her life as a loner. She devotes herself to becoming the best ninja she can every day. That also includes following around and referring to Sensei as her lord among other things.
Hobby: Studying the art of ninjutsu, squiring her lord

Skills.Name: Izuna Ninja Scrolls!
Skills.Desc: Repositions to the selected location and increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Secret Weapon, Exploding Shurikens!
Skills.Desc: Every 6 normal attacks, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: Izuna-Style Prickly Ninjutsu!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Izuna-Style Prickly Ninjutsu!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Izuna-Style Rapid Growth Ninjutsu!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 30s after Izuna uses her EX skill.

Weapon.Name: Izuna-Style Super Ninja Tool
Weapon.Desc:
Izuna's favorite submachine gun.

A cutting-edge ninja tool used in conjunction with Izuna-Style Ninjutsu. Can fire smoke bombs and even massage her lord's shoulders. Its uses are endless.

Name: Shizuko
ProfileIntroduction:
President of the Festival Operations Department at Hyakkiyako Academy.

The mascot of Momoyodou, the Hyakkiyako's traditional tea house. Acts clumsy, but only because it sells her image as an idol. In truth, she's an expert flirt willing to do anything for the success of the festivals and Momoyodou. Wears her heart on her sleeve, making her an easy read for her friends as well as Sensei.
Hobby: Serving and charming customers, Idol Punch

Skills.Name: Behold, Momoyodou!
Skills.Desc: Deploys cover with HP equal to a set amount plus <?1> of Shizuko's Max HP and increases the <b:HIT> of allies in a circular area around it by <?2> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Don't Stand in the Way of Business!
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and decreases their <d:ATK> by <?2> for 21s.

Skills.Name: T-Teeheehee?
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HIT> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: T-Teeheehee?+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HIT> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Pop Idol's Encouragement!
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Sakura Bonbon
Weapon.Desc:
A pump-action shotgun used by Shizuko.

According to Shizuko, "It is a one-of-a-kind weapon that has a faint scent of anmitsu, a specialty of Momoyodou."

Name: Aris
CharacterSSRNew: I've been waiting for your call for a long time.
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the Game Development Department at the Millennium School.

A mysterious girl who was found sleeping within some ruins. All information regarding Aris' age and origins is unknown. Currently, she has become a hardcore video game fanatic thanks to Midori and Momoi. The majority of her inarticulate speech is comprised of dialog from retro video games.

Skills.Name: Balance Breakdown
Skills.Desc: Deals damage to enemies in a straight line. Damage increases by 1.5× when at or 2× when at . Resets after use.

Skills.Name: Blinding Light!
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> for 20s and increases <s:EnergyBatteryEmpty='Energy Charge'> level by 1 (maximum level is 2).

Skills.Name: Enhanced Magic!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Enhanced Magic!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Supernova Awakening!
Skills.Desc: Increases by for 20s when Aris uses her EX skill. Effect increases by 1.5× when at or 2× when at .

Weapon.Name: Supernova: The Sword of Light
Weapon.Desc:
A massive railgun Aris received from the Engineering Department.

Its weight and power output are so great that ordinary students would have trouble just carrying it.

Name: Midori
CharacterSSRNew: I'm very proud of how this illustration turned out!
ProfileIntroduction:
Illustrator of the Game Development Department at the Millennium School.

Both Midori and her twin sister, Momoi, develop games with the Game Development Department.
Though her introverted personality had previously put her at odds with her more gregarious older sister, the two are now inseparable thanks to their shared love of video games.

Skills.Name: Drawing Art
Skills.Desc: Fires 5 shots that target up to 5 different enemies, each shot dealing <?1> damage. If Momoi is in the same unit, each shot also inflicts <d:Poison>, continuously dealing <?2> damage every 4s for 20s.

Skills.Name: Artistic Polish
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, restores the HP of the ally with the lowest HP (except self) for <?1> of Healing.

Skills.Name: Artist's Inspiration
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Artist's Inspiration+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Developmental Synergy: Momoi
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1>. If Momoi is in the same unit, increases by <?2> instead.

Weapon.Name: Fresh Inspiration
Weapon.Desc:
A sniper rifle used by Midori.

Fitted with an accessory from her big sister, which Midori fidgets with in a pinch. It always seems to spark an idea.

Name: Momoi
ProfileIntroduction:
Scenario writer of the Game Development Department at the Millennium School.

Both Momoi and her twin sister, Midori, develop games with the Game Development Department. Though her lighthearted and cheerful personality previously put her at odds with her more introverted little sister, the two are now inseparable thanks to their shared love of video games.

Skills.Name: Creative Anguish
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area. If Midori is in the same unit, also inflicts <d:Burn>, continuously dealing <?2> damage every 4s for 20s.

Skills.Name: Deadline Cruncher
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, increases <b:HIT> by <?1> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Creative Sense
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Creative Sense+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Developmental Synergy: Midori
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>. If Midori is in the same unit, increases by <?2> instead.

Weapon.Name: Unique Idea
Weapon.Desc:
An assault rifle used by Momoi.

Fitted with an accessory gifted from her little sister, which Momoi fidgets with in a pinch. It always seems to help spark an idea.

Name: Cherino
CharacterSSRNew: Feel the glory of facing me!
ProfileIntroduction:
Student council president of Red Winter Academy.

Greedy and obsessed with power, she loses her position in a revolution once a week but somehow always regains her authority. Cherino believes her power comes from the fake mustache she wears as a symbol of authority.
Hobby: Doling out demerits, purges, snowball fights

Skills.Name: Call in the Guards!
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area around Cherino.

Skills.Name: You Shall Be Purged!
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, applies <d:ConcentratedTarget> to the enemy with the highest ATK, and lowers their <d:CriticalDamageRateResist> by <?1> for 15s.

Skills.Name: Mustache Power!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Mustache Power!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Respect the 'Stache!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CostRegen> by <?1>. Effect is increased by <?2> for every other Red Winter student in the same unit (up to a maximum of 3 times).

Weapon.Name: Chistka
Weapon.Desc:
A pistol Cherino uses to purge dissenters.

Cherino simply aims the pistol and shouts, "Purge!" And just like that, it's done—without even pulling the trigger.

Name: Nodoka
ProfileIntroduction:
A student suspended from Red Winter Academy and on probation in Former Institute 227.

She was suspended for constantly monitoring Sensei through a telescope. Nodoka wants to observe the world's beauty and sees Sensei in the same vein. Being in Spec Ops No. 227 has taught her to be careful with what little money she has to get by.

Skills.Name: Observational Support
Skills.Desc: Increases the <b:HIT> of allies in a circular area by <?1> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Persistent Surveillance
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and decreases their <d:Dodge> by <?2> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Aesthetic Observation
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HIT> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Aesthetic Observation+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HIT> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: A Special Bond
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:HIT> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Sagittarius Night
Weapon.Desc:
A submachine gun that Nodoka often uses when she goes out to make astronomical observations.

A flashlight is attached to illuminate the road on dark nights.

Name: Yuzu
CharacterSSRNew: P-Please don't come looking for me...
ProfileIntroduction:
President of Millennium's Game Development Department.

Yuzu struggles with social anxiety and finds it difficult to deal with people, so she spends most of her time in a cabinet in the Game Development Department. Despite that, her passion for games is second to none. She loves both making and playing games.

Skills.Name: Press Start!
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area centered on one enemy.

Skills.Name: Max Chain Combo!
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area centered on the enemy with the highest ATK.

Skills.Name: Debugging Process...
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Debugging Process...+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: A Shy Girl's Courage
Skills.Desc: When Yuzu uses either her Basic or EX Skill, increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> for 6s.

Weapon.Name: Nyan's Dash
Weapon.Desc:
A grenade launcher used by Yuzu.

A clip of a cute cat running is constantly being played on the side of the weapon.

Name: Azusa
CharacterSSRNew:
All is futile, and life has no meaning.
Though part of me wants to trust you.
ProfileIntroduction:
The ice queen of Trinity's Make-Up Work Club.

After dropping out of school, she ended up at Trinity and is studying again. Despite being lonely, Azusa distances herself from others to avoid causing trouble—a source of concern for the other Make-Up Work Club members.

Skills.Name: Intulit Mortem
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: Sagitta Mortis
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and decreases their <d:DEF> by <?2> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Grueling Training
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Grueling Training+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Kick 'em While They're Down
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage as an additional hit to enemies inflicted with a debuff.

Weapon.Name: Et Omnia Vanitas
Weapon.Desc:
A gun cherished by Azusa.

The engraving on its barrel means, "Vanity of vanities: All is in vain".

Name: Hanako
ProfileIntroduction:
A friendly girl from the Make-Up Work Club.

She may appear like a quiet and elegant young lady at first, but a bevy of inappropriate and lewd comments spew out any time Hanako opens her mouth. Every member of the Make-Up Work Club gets nervous whenever Hanako starts speaking.

Skills.Name: Want to Break the Rules?
Skills.Desc: Creates a circular zone that continuously restores the HP of all allies inside it by <?1> of Healing every 1.8s for 8s.

Skills.Name: Toughen Up!
Skills.Desc: Every 20s, increases the <b:DEF> of the ally with the lowest HP by <?1> for 13s.

Skills.Name: Toughen Up!+
Skills.Desc: Every 20s, increases the of the two allies with the lowest HP by for 13s and restores their HP by of Healing.

Skills.Name: Full of Energy
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Full of Energy+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: It's Okay If It's You
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Honest Wish
Weapon.Desc:
Hanako's assault rifle.

It has a rather straightforward name.
She won't answer when asked about its meaning, however.

Gear.Name: Suspicious Classical Literature
Gear.Desc: Hanako's most prized possession. Despite having been confiscated over and over again, this book always ends up back in her hands.

Name: Koharu
CharacterSSRNew: Burn all the dirty stuff! Burn it!
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of Trinity's Make-Up Work Club.

Koharu was originally part of the Justice Task Force, but she was forced to transfer to the Make-Up Work Club due to poor grades which put her at risk of flunking. A dunce who can't keep up with her classes despite thinking she's an elite student. Koharu reads racy material for fun, and gets dirty ideas from the most trivial things, which ends with her embarrassing herself.

Skills.Name: Holy Grenade
Skills.Desc: Throws a grenade that restores the HP of allies by <?1> of Healing and deals <?2> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: I'll Heal You!
Skills.Desc: When an ally except self has less than 50% HP, restores their HP by <?1> of Healing. 20s cooldown between activations.

Skills.Name: I'm Trying!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: I'm Trying!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Being the Elite!
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> for 20s.

Weapon.Name: Justice Black
Weapon.Desc:
A sniper rifle used by Koharu.

It was named when Koharu was part of the Justice Task Force.

Name: Azusa (Swimsuit)
CharacterSSRNew: The beach... I'm still not used to it.
ProfileIntroduction:
The Make-Up Work Club's ice queen visits the beach for the first time.

She tries to keep cool and calm as usual to not cause trouble for others, but her friends want to make sure she enjoys her first beach trip. This causes her to worry about what others might think of her; but from their perspective, she's just the usual Azusa.

Skills.Name: Spicea Aqua
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy and inflicts <d:Chill>, continuously dealing <?2> damage every 4s for 20s.

Skills.Name: Ira Litore
Skills.Desc: Every 35s, increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Cold Water
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Cold Water+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Salt Water in the Wound
Skills.Desc: Attacks have a 30% chance to decrease the target's <d:DEF> by <?1> for 13s. 5s cooldown between activations.

Weapon.Name: Et Omnia Vanitas
Weapon.Desc:
Azusa's assault rifle.

It continuously shines brilliantly, unlike its bashful owner trying to hide her excitement for the beach.

Name: Mashiro (Swimsuit)
CharacterSSRNew: Justice doesn't back down, even in sweltering heat!
ProfileIntroduction:
A devoted Justice Task Force member who escorted Tsurugi to the beach.

Mashiro does not stop training while other students go out to play and make summer memories. She believes that this is the way of justice.

Skills.Name: Barrage of Justice
Skills.Desc: Decreases the <d:Dodge> of one enemy by <?1> for 30s, and deals <?2> damage to them.

Skills.Name: Solidarity of Justice
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, increases the <b:CriticalDamage> of the ally with the highest ATK by <?1> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Gaze of Justice
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Gaze of Justice+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Blessing of Justice
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:HIT> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Manifestation of Justice
Weapon.Desc:
A sniper rifle that Mashiro uses to carry out her duties in the Justice Task Force.

Duty to justice continues even on the beach.

Name: Tsurugi (Swimsuit)
ProfileIntroduction:
Trinity's Justice Task Force's president comes to the beach in pursuit of the romance of youth.

She tries her best to suppress her violent temperament famous for being Trinity's secret weapon and enjoy her youth on vacation...but the beach didn't pan out the way she wanted.

Skills.Name: Torrent
Skills.Desc: Augments <s:FormChange> to deal <?1> damage as an additional hit for <?2>. (Normal Attack changes to hit 2 times)

Skills.Name: Hot Strike
Skills.Desc: Every 35s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: Nimble On My Feet
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Nimble On My Feet+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1> and <b:AttackSpeed> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Warmed Up
Skills.Desc: When Tsurugi uses her Basic Skill, increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> for 30s.

Weapon.Name: Blood 'n' Gunpowder
Weapon.Desc:
Two shotguns used by Tsurugi.

Can still fire without issue even after being submerged underwater.

Name: Hifumi (Swimsuit)
CharacterSSRNew: Ahaha... It's a bit embarrassing having such a plain swimsuit.
ProfileIntroduction:
A friendly Trinity Make-Up Work Club member visiting the beach with her friend.

She secretly borrowed a Crusader tank for a friend who had never been to the beach. Unfortunately, the Justice Task Force found out and she got in deep trouble. She happily rides the borrowed tank, just as clumsily as ever.
Hobby: Peroro merch, shopping, listening to others

Skills.Name: Crusadie Backup!
Skills.Desc: Deploys Hifumi riding Crusadie for 50s, granting it an additional <?1> of Hifumi's <b:ATK>. Only one tactical support vehicle may be deployed at any given time.

Skills.Name: Peroro's Strike
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: Peroro's Strike+
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in 3 circular areas. Enemies that overlap multiple areas only receive <?2> damage on subsequent hits.

Skills.Name: Collector's Drive
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Collector's Drive+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Angry Adelie's Blessing
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: My Necessity
Weapon.Desc:
A pink rifle carried around by Hifumi.

This firearm with cute engravings is a must-have for beach vacations.

Gear.Name: Momo Friends Teapot: Tank Edition
Gear.Desc:
Hifumi's special Peroro teapot. She swears its necessary equipment for the beach.
This limited-edition teapot was made to look like a tank...for some reason. Hifumi apparently saved up for this item for a long time.

Name: Hina (Swimsuit)
CharacterSSRNew: My duties don't change simply because it is summertime.
ProfileIntroduction:
Gehenna Academy head prefect visiting the beach for summer boot camp.

She may be aloof about most things, but was convinced to visit the beach for training. She's rarely been to the beach, so her swimsuit and floats are a little dated. She's slightly embarrassed they still fit her. Will not hesitate to enforce discipline even during the summer or against the raging sea.

Skills.Name: Ish-bosheth of the Beach
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to up to 5 enemies in a fan-shaped area.

Skills.Name: Throw and Knock-Out
Skills.Desc: Every 20s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and inflicts <c:Stunned> for <?2>.

Skills.Name: Throw and Knock-Out+
Skills.Desc: Every 20s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and inflicts <c:Stunned> for <?2>.

Skills.Name: Prefect Team Inexorability
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Prefect Team Inexorability+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:OppressionPower> by <?1> and <b:CriticalChance> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Morality Check
Skills.Desc: When Hina uses her EX skill, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> until the end of battle. Effect can stack up to 5 times.

Weapon.Name: Destroyer of Denouement
Weapon.Desc:
A multipurpose machine gun Hina wields as naturally as any limb.

 The weapon's ruthlessness is undeniable, even when its owner is taking a break from Gehenna at a beach.

Gear.Name: Prefect Team's Official Tube
Gear.Desc:
The Gehenna Prefect Team has deemed this tube its official club tube.
This special tube is made of top-of-the-line materials to ensure Hina's safety, who can't swim. You'll never see her in the water without it.

Name: Iori (Swimsuit)
CharacterSSRNew: There had better not be any fools caught up in breaking the rules.
ProfileIntroduction:
A cold-blooded specialist of Gehenna's Prefect Team participating in summer boot camp.

Closely monitored Gehenna's troublemakers from getting out of line at the beach alongside other Prefect Team members. She's deeply disappointed that summer camp was ruined by the constant appearance of those fools, even if she tries to hide it.

Skills.Name: Storm and Gale
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: Cutting the Gordian Knot
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and inflicts <d:Chill>, continuously dealing <?2> damage every 4s for 20s.

Skills.Name: Sharp Shooting
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Sharp Shooting+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Coercion of the Specialist
Skills.Desc: Attacks have a 25% chance to inflict <d:Chill>, continuously dealing <?1> damage every 4s for 20s. 10s cooldown between activations.

Weapon.Name: Crack Shot
Weapon.Desc:
A sniper rifle used by Iori to deal with fugitives.

Strengthened by adding a rifle grenade in the shape of a carbonated drink bottle.

Name: Izumi (Swimsuit)
ProfileIntroduction:
A Gehenna Gourmet Research Society member with a gluttonous appetite even during the summer.

She visits the beach with a watermelon in one hand and an ice cooler in the other in search of renown summer delicacies: Chocolate-flavored grilled unagi, spicy shaved ice, watermelon sprinkled with mint chocolate, and more. Her pursuit of various delicacies in Kivotos are second to none as her peculiar excursions continue even on the hot summer beach.

Skills.Name: Cold Coconut Juice!
Skills.Desc: Throws a coconut at an enemy that deals <?1> damage and inflicts <c:Stunned> for <?2>, bouncing to other nearby enemies that have not been hit yet, up to 5 times. (The damage of subsequent hits is reduced by 10% for each enemy).

Skills.Name: Sweet n' Sour, Crunchy n' Crispy!
