Skills.Desc: Every 35s, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Sweet n' Sour, Crunchy n' Crispy!+
Skills.Desc: Every 35s, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Take a Bite and Smile!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Take a Bite and Smile!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:Stability> by <?1> and <b:AttackSpeed> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Leaves Your Head Spinning!
Skills.Desc: Attacks have a 10% chance to <c:Stunned> the target for <?1>. 20s cooldown between activations.

Weapon.Name: Daily Cutlery
Weapon.Desc:
A heavy machine gun used by Izumi.

Even now, Izumi's gun burns in search of a gourmet summer experience! It's even complete with waterproof functionality!

Gear.Name: Midsummer Ice Cooler
Gear.Desc: Izumi stuffed this cooler full of fruit, drinks, and secret spices—a perfect treat for midsummer relaxation.

Name: Shiroko (Cycling)
CharacterSSRNew: Then, I'll talk to you later, Sensei.
ProfileIntroduction:
The Foreclosure Task Force captain is earnestly training for summer.

She changed into her cycling jersey for some summer training, and is as usual, serious about completing her near-impossible trek across Kivotos.

Skills.Name: Riding Grenade
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area and decreases their <d:ATK> by <?2> for 10s.

Skills.Name: Concentrated Fire
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a straight line.

Skills.Name: Rapid Fire
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Rapid Fire+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Insightful Fire
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage as an additional hit to enemies inflicted with a debuff.

Weapon.Name: White Fang 465
Weapon.Desc:
Shiroko's favorite assault rifle.

Various tune-ups and modifications have been made to better suit long-distance traveling.

Name: Shun (Small)
CharacterSSRNew: It's really convenient being this small again!
ProfileIntroduction:
An instructor of the Plum Blossom Garden who drank Saya's elixir and transformed into her smaller self.

Even though her body is young, her mind is the same, so she tries to speak with maturity, but she sometimes gives in to her childlike instincts.

Skills.Name: Someone's Been Naughty
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy. This attack ignores <?2> of the enemy's DEF.

Skills.Name: You Need a Talking To!
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: You Need a Talking To!+
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy. This attack ignores <?2> of the enemy's DEF.

Skills.Name: Bundle of Energy
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Bundle of Energy+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and <b:AttackSpeed> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Sooo Heavy!
Skills.Desc: Decreases <d:ATK> by 21.7% for 20s after Shun uses her EX skill. After 20s, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 20s.

Weapon.Name: Halcon de Amor
Weapon.Desc:
A sniper rifle inlaid with Shun's favorite pattern.

Its size has become cumbersome for Shun's much smaller frame.

Gear.Name: Shun's Childhood Memories
Gear.Desc: A pair of mother-of-pearl hairpins that Shun cherishes. Now that she's older, she rarely uses them because she doesn't wear pigtails very often. But they're a part of Shun's precious memories that never change.

Name: Kirino
ProfileIntroduction:
A passionate cadet of Valkyrie Police School's Public Safety Bureau.

She enrolled in Valkyrie Police School because of her admiration for the upperclassmen, but was transferred to the Public Safety Bureau due to her poor marksmanship. However, she still works hard and dreams of becoming an officer who can gloriously subdue criminals.

Skills.Name: Done Talking!
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area and creates a smokescreen for 20s that decreases the <d:HIT> of enemies inside it by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Suppressing Violence!
Skills.Desc: Every 20s, deals <?1> damage to the furthest enemy and decreases their <d:HIT> by <?2> for 13s.

Skills.Name: Back on the Horse!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Back on the Horse!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> and <b:MAXHP> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: No Time to Rest!
Skills.Desc: Attacks have a 30% chance to decrease the target's <d:HealEffectiveness> by <?1> for 13s. 5s cooldown between activations.

Weapon.Name: Valkyrie Service Pistol No.3
Weapon.Desc:
A standard-issue pistol Kirino received from Valkyrie Police School.

Kirino often blames this pistol for her poor shooting skills.

Name: Saya (Casual)
CharacterSSRNew: Even a genius like me needs some time off. Hahaha...
ProfileIntroduction:
The genius inventor of Shanhaijing on a day off from her busy life.

Contrary to her usual days of being confined to the lab and devoting herself solely to researching new elixirs, Saya is active enough to ride a skateboard and roam around the streets during her days off. However, her constant intellectual curiosity for exploring new things remains the same even when she's taking it easy.

Skills.Name: A Gift from Me!
Skills.Desc: Creates a rectangular zone that continuously deals <?1> damage to enemies inside it every 1s for 20s.

Skills.Name: The Experiments Must Continue!
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: The Experiments Must Continue!+
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area and inflicts them with <d:Poison>, continuously dealing <?2> damage every 4s for 20s.

Skills.Name: Focus Elixir
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Focus Elixir+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:Stability> by <?1> and <b:CriticalDamage> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: This Isn't Suspicious!
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Pistol of the Great I
Weapon.Desc:
A custom-made pistol that Saya modified herself.

Its pink slide makes it a stylish accessory even on days off.

Gear.Name: Saya's Skateboard
Gear.Desc: Saya's decorated skateboard. It allows the free use of both hands, unlike bicycles or scooters, but also requires a certain level of skill.

Name: Neru (Bunny)
CharacterSSRNew: Seriously, this is not my cup of tea.
ProfileIntroduction:
The president of C&C who changed into a bunny girl outfit for a special mission. 

It's not the kind of outfit Neru would normally wear, but she doesn't hesitate to wear it for a mission.
She is laying low and dialing down her usual temperament for the mission's sake, but she still won't give up her flashy bomber jacket.

Skills.Name: Hold It Right There!
Skills.Desc: Repositions to the selected location, gaining a <b:Shield> with HP equal to <?1> of Healing for 20s while dealing <?2> damage to enemies in a circular area<?3>.

Skills.Name: What Are You Looking At?!
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, increases <b:Dodge> by <?1> for 23s.

Skills.Name: Abrasion
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Abrasion+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1> and <b:CriticalDamage> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Much More Painful
Skills.Desc: Deals damage as an additional hit to medium sized enemies.

Weapon.Name: Twin Dragons
Weapon.Desc:
The pair of SMGs used by Neru.

The chain connecting the two rattles splendidly as she runs.

Name: Karin (Bunny)
CharacterSSRNew: There's no mission I can't accomplish.
ProfileIntroduction:
A C&C agent on the front lines.

She is focused only on accomplishing the mission without complaint or concern for her outfit.
Still, the longer-than-normal stares from others are a bit bothersome.

Skills.Name: Fast and Accurate
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area. This attack ignores <?2> of the enemy's DEF.

Skills.Name: Area Fire
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area. This attack ignores <?2> of the enemy's DEF.

Skills.Name: Enhanced Firepower
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Enhanced Firepower+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Precise and Careful
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> for 40s after Karin uses her EX skill.

Weapon.Name: Big Eye
Weapon.Desc:
A massive sniper rifle used exclusively by Karin.

It's so accurate that one could shoot down a dashing rabbit with it.

Name: Asuna (Bunny)
CharacterSSRNew: Let's have fun again, Master!
ProfileIntroduction:
An agent of C&C who changed into a bunny girl outfit to go undercover.

She remains highly energetic, unlike the other members even when wearing a bunny girl outfit instead of her usual maid uniform.
On the contrary, Asuna is enjoying the experiences she encounters in new places.

Skills.Name: Watch This!
Skills.Desc: Decreases the <d:DEF> of enemies in a circular area by <?1> for 40s and deals <?2> damage to them.

Skills.Name: Get Pumped!
Skills.Desc: Every 35s, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 23s.

Skills.Name: Get Pumped!+
Skills.Desc: Every 35s, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 23s and generates <?2> units of skill cost.

Skills.Name: Savoring It
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Savoring It+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Here's a Freebie!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> for 30s when Asuna uses her EX skill.

Weapon.Name: Surprise Party
Weapon.Desc:
An assault rifle used by Asuna.

Its name isn't really appropriate for undercover missions, but that hardly bothers Asuna.

Gear.Name: Rabbit Tail Grenade
Gear.Desc: A grenade in the shape of a rabbit tail that Asuna wears while wearing her bunny girl outfit. It looks harmless because it's fluffy, but it's just as destructive as any other grenade.

Name: Natsu
CharacterSSRNew: Have you ever thought about shortcakes, Sensei?
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the Trinity After-School Sweets Club, head troublemaker, and a self-proclaimed romantic.

Has a habit of being strangely philosophical and comparing everything to desserts, making people around her feel awkward. She claims she simply wants to share her romanticism with everyone. However, it's impossible to deny that Natsu may just be messing with everyone since her definition of "romance" is always changing.

Skills.Name: Hidden Ace
Skills.Desc: Restores own HP by <?1> of Healing and removes 1 debuff.

Skills.Name: One Bite at a Time!
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, throws a pie to the nearest ally, increasing their <b:ATK> by <?1> for 20s. The pie can bounce and give this effect to additional allies (except self) who have not yet received it, up to 3 times.

Skills.Name: Hearty!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Hearty!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: A Mouth Full of Happiness
Skills.Desc: When Natsu uses her EX skill, increases <b:HealEffectiveness> by <?1> until the end of battle. Effect can stack up to 3 times.

Weapon.Name: Beyond Lumination
Weapon.Desc:
Natsu's submachine gun.

A weapon used as a last resort by the typically peaceful Natsu.

Name: Mari
ProfileIntroduction:
A sincere and benevolent girl affiliated with the Sisterhood.

She always greets Trinity students with a friendly smile. Despite her cuteness, many come to her for counseling because of the calm and relaxing air about her. She is self-critical and always considers herself as lacking, but she dreams of becoming a great Sister like her upperclassmen.

Skills.Name: Divine Protection
Skills.Desc: Grants a <b:Shield> to one ally with HP equal to <?1> of Mari's Healing lasting up to 20s and removes 1 debuff from them.

Skills.Name: Purifying Barrage
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: Resolute Determination
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Resolute Determination+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Benevolent Blessings
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Piety
Weapon.Desc:
A pistol carried by Mari.

Despite always being on her person, nobody has actually seen her use it.

Name: Hatsune Miku
CharacterSSRNew: Please listen to my song!
ProfileIntroduction:
A virtual idol with a cheerful personality who loves to sing.

Originally, she only existed virtually online with no physical body, but she came to exist in the real world just in time for her live performance with the help of Kivotos' technology. She has quite a few hidden fans in Kivotos due to her ability to sing across time and space.

Skills.Name: My Heart in This Moment!
Skills.Desc: Restores the HP of allies in a circular area by <?1> of Healing and summons Hatsune Miku at the center for 26s.

ExtraSkills.Name: My Heart in This Moment!
ExtraSkills.Desc: Increases the <b:ATK> of all allies in a circular area around Hatsune Miku by <?1> as long as they stay within range.

Skills.Name: Hatsune Miku's Passion
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, increases the <b:CriticalChance> of allies in a circular area by <?1> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Hatsune Miku's Support
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Hatsune Miku's Support+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Hatsune Miku's Blessing
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:HealEffectiveness> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Concert T-Shirt Cannon
Weapon.Desc:
A gigantic t-shirt gun Miku uses to launch merchandise into the crowd at concerts.

There are diodes and other things embedded in the surface, and they sparkle beautifully with her music.

Name: Ako
CharacterSSRNew: There will be no mistakes as long as I'm here!
ProfileIntroduction:
Senior administrator of the Gehenna Prefect Team and secretary to the head prefect, Hina.

Ako is always by Hina's side, assisting her. At first glance, she appears to be kind and good-natured, but she ruthlessly suppresses rule-breakers, showing no mercy. The students of Gehenna often call her "Hina's pet," but she doesn't seem to mind.

Skills.Name: Reconnaissance Report
Skills.Desc: Increases the <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> and <b:CriticalDamage> by <?2> of one ally for 16s.

Skills.Name: Supply Operation Plan B
Skills.Desc: Every 45s, restores the HP of the ally with the lowest HP by <?1> of Healing.

Skills.Name: Beginning Supply Support
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Beginning Supply Support+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Beginning Tactical Support
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Hot Shot
Weapon.Desc:
A pistol used by Ako.

This pistol was awarded to Ako for reaching the position of senior administrator with painstaking effort. She always carries it with her and takes very good care of it.

Name: Cherino (Hot Spring)
CharacterSSRNew: Kneel before the magnificence of Purginator No. 1!
ProfileIntroduction:
The president of Red Winter Federal Academy who came to Hot Springs Resort No. 227 to enjoy a vacation.

At first, she was planning to demolish the resort that Spec Ops built without her permission, but satisfied with the hospitality of Nodoka and the Spec Ops students, she's decided to extend her stay indefinitely. She doesn't really enjoy getting into the hot springs despite how much she likes resting at the resort and eating its food.
Hobby: Doling out demerits, purging, snowball fights

Skills.Name: Purginator No. 1, Mobilize!
Skills.Desc: Deploys Cherino riding Purginator No. 1 for 50s, granting it an additional <?1> of Cherino's <b:ATK>. Only one tactical support vehicle may be deployed at any given time.

Skills.Name: Aim, Purge!
Skills.Desc: Every 15s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: Aim, Purge!+
Skills.Desc: Every 15s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area and creates a circular zone that continuously deals <?2> damage every 1s for 5s.

Skills.Name: Mustache Rage!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Mustache Rage!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Power of the 'Stache!
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Chistka
Weapon.Desc:
A pistol Cherino uses to purge dissenters.

Tomoe modified some of its materials to prevent it from rusting, even in high temperature and humidity.

Gear.Name: Comrade Bathtime
Gear.Desc:
A souvenir from Red Winter Academy, carefully handmade by gluing a mustache onto a mass-produced rubber duck.
Cherino claims that they're childish toys which she has no interest in, but rumor has it one has been seen in the bathtub after she's finished...

Name: Chinatsu (Hot Spring)
CharacterSSRNew: I want to take it...slow today.
ProfileIntroduction:
The head of the Medical Committee who happens to visit the hot springs resort while on duty.

Chinatsu's problems don't stop even at the snowy hot springs resort—from ordering new medicine to the latest Hot Springs Development Department conspiracy. However, the scenery of the idyllic hot springs makes the weary Chinatsu a bit indolent.

Skills.Name: Type A Combat Stimulant
Skills.Desc: Increases the <b:AttackSpeed> of one ally except self by <?1> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Reinforced Combat Enhancement
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, increases the <b:AttackSpeed> of one ally except self by <?1> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Relaxing Vacation
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Relaxing Vacation+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Cautious First Aid Head
Skills.Desc: When Chinatsu uses her EX skill, she gains a <b:Shield> with HP equal to <?1> of Healing lasting up to 30s.

Weapon.Name: Support Pointer
Weapon.Desc:
Chinatsu's favorite pistol.

Small and light, Chinatsu's pistol is easy to handle and very suitable for undercover missions in hot springs resorts.

Name: Tomoe
ProfileIntroduction:
The chief secretary of the Red Winter Office and President Cherino's closest aide.

A speaking master who can wrap up and deliver just about any message. She gives regular speeches at the academy to inspire loyalty to President Cherino. Cherino believes Tomoe is loyal because she is smitten by her charisma, but in fact, Tomoe simply finds Cherino adorable.

Skills.Name: Everyone, Please Listen to Me!
Skills.Desc: Increases the <b:CriticalChance> and <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>, <b:MoveSpeed> by 30.8% but decreases <d:Range> by 38.5% for all allies in a circular area around Tomoe for 30s.

Skills.Name: Clever Incitement
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: Smooth Sailing
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Smooth Sailing+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Irrefutable Evidence
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage as an additional hit to enemies protected by a <b:Shield>.

Weapon.Name: Vernost
Weapon.Desc:
A long sniper rifle used by Tomoe.

Equipped with a high-res telescopic sight making it possible to spot targets from afar and dispose of any insubordinate who doubts the authority of President Cherino.

Name: Nodoka (Hot Spring)
CharacterSSRNew: I will serve my guests with all my heart!
ProfileIntroduction:
The owner of Hot Springs Resort No. 227 who runs the large resort with the Spec Ops students.

She is still suspended from the Red Winter Office, but finds herself with newfound wealth when a hot spring suddenly erupts at the Former Institute. However, her troubles continue as students with strong personalities from Red Winter Federal Academy come to disrupt her business for various reasons.

Skills.Name: Hot Springs Resort No. 227, Open for Business!
Skills.Desc: Summons Nodoka (Hot Spring) to the selected location who throws snacks at allies for 32s.

Skills.Name: The Hostess' Welcome
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, increases the <b:HealEffectiveness> of the ally with the lowest HP by <?1> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Hot Springs Therapy
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Hot Springs Therapy+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Hot Springs Heat
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Sagittarius Night
Weapon.Desc:
A submachine gun Nodoka carries everywhere.

It is usually used to guide others around the dark paths of the hot springs resort at night, but it is also needed to "serve" rude customers.

Name: Aru (New Year)
CharacterSSRNew:
Heeheehee. This is the first commission of the year, right?
Okay, I'll give it my best.
ProfileIntroduction:
The eternal boss of Problem Solver 68.

Aru spends a lot of money on getting her hair done and renting an outfit to wear to the New Year's event in the hopes that her fixer agency will prosper in the new year.Perhaps because she feels more confident than usual, she has been putting on the air of a dignified boss, walking and talking in a nonchalant and carefree way.

Skills.Name: Hard-Boiled Hanetsuki Shot
Skills.Desc: Consumes all <s:Misdeed>, generating <?1> units of skill cost for each stack consumed and dealing <?2> damage to one enemy that bounces and deals the same damage to a nearby enemy, up to 11 times.

Skills.Name: Noir-Style Hanetsuki Attack
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: Gorgeous Dignity of a Boss
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Gorgeous Dignity of a Boss+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> and <b:MAXHP> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Perfect Tactics of a Boss
Skills.Desc: For every 6 enemies defeated by allies, Aru gains one <s:Misdeed='Evil Deed'>. Decreases DEF by <?1> per <s:Misdeed='Evil Deed'> held and she can hold a maximum of <?2>.

Weapon.Name: Wine Red Admire
Weapon.Desc:
A semi-automatic sniper rifle with an antique design cherished by Aru.

According to Aru, her hard-boiled nature culminates just as her years of experience do with the upcoming New Year.

Name: Mutsuki (New Year)
CharacterSSRNew: Heeheehee! Let's have a lot of fun this year, Sensei!
ProfileIntroduction:
Problem Solver 68's resident go-getter and chief of staff.

She goes to the New Year event with Aru to celebrate the upcoming new year. Mutsuki puts more effort into dressing up nicely for New Year's, but it doesn't change how she laughs and thoroughly enjoys watching the troubles that arise from her evil deeds. This troublemaker enjoys the new year with Aru, who always seems to be in trouble for one reason or another.

Skills.Name: New Year's Symphony
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in an donut-shaped area.

Skills.Name: Imp Chorus
Skills.Desc: Every 50s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a straight line. If Mutsuki has 6 <s:LittleDevil>, deals an additional <?2> damage.

Skills.Name: How to Have More Fun
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: How to Have More Fun+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:Penetration> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Cute Imp Scheme
Skills.Desc: Every 3 times that Mutsuki's EX Skill hits an enemy, she gains one lasting for 56s. Increases Crit DMG by per held, and she can hold a maximum of 6.

Weapon.Name: Trick or Trick
Weapon.Desc:
A multipurpose machine gun that Mutsuki always carries.

Quietly kept in her bag as she celebrates New Year's. But, as Mutsuki always says with a smile, "I'm always up for a prank or two..."

Name: Serika (New Year)
CharacterSSRNew: Well, if it's for Sensei, I'll lift up a prayer or two.
ProfileIntroduction:
The smart treasurer of the Abydos Foreclosure Task Force.

A diligent girl who works several part-time jobs to help the Foreclosure Task Force, she is now working as a miko for the new year. Serika is giving it her patented best after being told she would get higher pay if she plays a convincing miko.

Skills.Name: Part-Time Interference!
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in an donut-shaped area and decreases their <d:CriticalDamage> by <?2> for 30s.

Skills.Name: A Miko Cheers for Everyone!
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, increases the <b:ATK> of all allies in a circular area by <?1> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Full-Time Stubbornness
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Full-Time Stubbornness+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Full-Time Tenacity
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalDamageRateResist> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Sincerity
Weapon.Desc:
An assault rifle Serika carries with her whenever she goes to work part time.

She also takes it to her part-time miko job and uses it to quiet troublemakers who cause a ruckus at the New Year's event.

Name: Wakamo
CharacterSSRNew: Oh... We meet at last. ♥
ProfileIntroduction:
One of the Seven Prisoners that escaped the Corrections Bureau after being suspended from Allied Hyakkiyako Academy.

She is the feared Fox of Calamity due to her destructive ways. Her motives are a mystery, and there are several rumors surrounding the face under her mask. Some say there's a monstrous devil underneath, but it remains only a rumor.

Skills.Name: Crimson Flower Divination
Skills.Desc: Deals damage to one enemy and inflicts for 10s. For the duration of the effect, all damage taken from allies will be accumulated and dealt again as Mystic damage once it expires, up to a maximum of of Wakamo's ATK. (This additional damage cannot critically hit.)

Skills.Name: Scattering Petals
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: Scattering Petals+
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: Bloom of Destruction
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Bloom of Destruction+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Full Bloom Battle Instinct
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage as an additional hit to BOSS enemies.

Weapon.Name: Crimson Calamity
Weapon.Desc:
Wakamo's favorite rifle.

Contrary to its antique design, it's a terrifying gun that always smells like smoke and gunpowder. It's mainly used to take care of the obstacles that threaten Sensei's safety.

Gear.Name: Concealing Fox Mask
Gear.Desc: Wakamo's beloved fox mask. It was originally intended to hide the identity of its wearer, but now it hides much more than that. This is the perfect fashion piece for concealing a young girl's heart.

Name: Fubuki
ProfileIntroduction:
A laid-back administrative advisor of Valkyrie Police School.

She entered Valkyrie longing for a laid-back, easygoing life as a civil servant. She remains negligent, enjoying life as it is without being swayed by money or fame even when a case is sent to the Public Safety Bureau. Her favorite activity is eating donuts while listening to the radio.

Skills.Name: Sweet Relief
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 46s.

Skills.Name: Every Last Round!
Skills.Desc: When Fubuki's current ammo is 3 or less, consumes all remaining ammo to deal <?1> damage to one enemy and inflict <c:Stunned> for <?2>.

Skills.Name: Traffic Map
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:OppressionPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Traffic Map+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> and <b:OppressionPower> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Free Ride
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 10s whenever an ally uses their EX skill.

Weapon.Name: Valkyrie Standard Rifle No. 14
Weapon.Desc:
A standard rifle that Fubuki received from Valkyrie Police School.

It's pretty powerful, but it doesn't function properly because Fubuki has neglected to take care of it.

Name: Sena
CharacterSSRNew: Where is the corpse...? I mean, where is the injured patient?
ProfileIntroduction:
President of Gehenna's always busy Medical Emergency Club.

She transports the wounded with a stoic face no matter the situation. She may seem apathetic as she treats the wounded like inanimate cargo, but she has never once complained about transporting numerous injured people all over Gehenna.

Skills.Name: Emergency Dispatch
Skills.Desc: Deploys Sena riding Tactical Ambulance 11 for 50s, granting it an additional <?1> of Sena's <b:HealPower>. Only one tactical support vehicle may be deployed at any given time.

Skills.Name: Energy Injection
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, increases the <b:ATK> of the ally with the highest ATK by <?1> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Emergency Assist
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Emergency Assist+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: As Soon as Possible
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Portable Emergency Kit
Weapon.Desc:
Sena's sawed-off grenade launcher.

Used to quickly clear obstacles during emergency dispatches. Also used to occasionally clear people who are in the way.

Name: Chihiro
CharacterSSRNew: New security vulnerability found.
ProfileIntroduction:
Vice president of Veritas, Millennium Science School's hacker group.

A genius programmer with excellent hacking skills, she is not afraid of getting her hands dirty when the task demands, whether it's going undercover or in the field. She actually has common sense unlike most of Veritas' devilish members. She is always emphasizing proper hacking ethics to other members.

Skills.Name: Override
Skills.Desc: Deals damage to one enemy. If the target is Heavy armor type, inflicts for .

Skills.Name: Through the Backdoor
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, decreases the <d:ATK> of the enemy with the highest ATK by <?1> for 23s.

Skills.Name: Exploit
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Exploit+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Building a Firewall
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:OppressionPower> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Backdoor
Weapon.Desc:
An automatic rifle used by Chihiro.

According to Chihiro, it's the fastest way to find out an encrypted password.

Name: Mimori
CharacterSSRNew:
I still have a long way to go...
but I'll show you the results of my training.
ProfileIntroduction:
Hyakkiyako Academy Inner Discipline Club's kind vice president.

A popular girl because she always has a gentle smile and is kind to everyone. The childhood friend of Tsubaki, the president of the Inner Discipline Club. She joined the club to fulfill her dream of becoming an elegant lady like the ones in the shoujo manga she used to read when she was young. She continues to train diligently by cooking and cleaning to make her dream come true.

Skills.Name: Cherry Blossom Viewing
Skills.Desc: Repositions up to 5 allies in a circular area to the selected location and increases their <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> for 40s.

Skills.Name: I Brought a Bento
Skills.Desc: Every 45s, throws a bento to the ally with the lowest HP other than Mimori that grants <b:DotHeal>, continuously restoring HP equal to <?1> of Healing every 4s for 20s.

Skills.Name: I Brought a Bento+
Skills.Desc:
Every 45s, throws a bento to the ally with the lowest HP other than Mimori that grants <b:DotHeal>, continuously restoring HP equal to <?1> of Healing every 4s for 20s and increasing their <b:AttackSpeed> by <?2> for 20s.
The bento can bounce to an additional nearby ally other than Mimori (up to 2 times), increasing their <b:AttackSpeed> by <?3> for 20s.

Skills.Name: How About Another Plate?
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:DEF> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: How About Another Plate?+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:DEF> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Shall We Have a Taste?
Skills.Desc: Every 35s, increases the <b:DEF> of allies in a circular area by <?1> for 23s.

Weapon.Name: Soft Resolution
Weapon.Desc:
An automatic pistol that Mimori usually carries around.

She bought it when she first dreamt of becoming an elegant lady. She cherishes it, always having it by her side.

Gear.Name: Dreamy Cherry Blossom Apron
Gear.Desc: Mimori's cherry-blossom-colored apron. It's a good friend to have while cooking, cleaning, and doing one's household chores.

Name: Ui
CharacterSSRNew: P-Please, keep it down...
ProfileIntroduction:
Trinity Library Committee's Director.

A girl said to love books more than people that especially likes old books that clearly have history. She normally spends her time cooped up in Trinity's old library, curating the ancient texts.

Skills.Name: Ancient Texts Expert
Skills.Desc: Reduces the of one ally except self for their next two EX Skill uses by 50% (The amount reduced is rounded down) and increases their by for 46s.

Skills.Name: Imparting Knowledge
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, increases the <b:CriticalChance> of allies in a circular area by <?1> for 33s.

Skills.Name: Expert Skill
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Expert Skill+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Jitters
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> for 20s after Ui uses her EX skill.

Weapon.Name: Volume Suppressor
Weapon.Desc: A silencer rifle that Ui takes out when she can't stand the noise around her anymore. It lives up to its name, and silences its targets swiftly and effectively.

Name: Hinata
CharacterSSRNew: Do you need help with something?
ProfileIntroduction:
A hardworking and kindhearted girl affiliated with the Sisterhood.

In charge of caring for the Trinity Cathedral as she completes duties and remains polite to all. However, she often makes mistakes thanks to her clumsy disposition and lack of confidence. She always carries an installable grenade machine gun in her bag, but never seems to struggle with its weight.

Skills.Name: Last Means of Communication
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in 5 circular areas.

Skills.Name: Let's Talk First...!
Skills.Desc: Every 20s, deals <?1> damage to the enemy with the highest HP.

Skills.Name: Let's Talk First...!+
Skills.Desc: Every 20s, deals <?1> damage to the enemy with the highest HP. The final hit of this skill will bounce to one nearby enemy, dealing <?2> damage.

Skills.Name: Unexpected Development
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Unexpected Development+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Leave the Heavy Lifting to Me!
Skills.Desc: Deals damage as an additional hit to medium sized enemies.

Weapon.Name: Reverence
Weapon.Desc:
A pistol Hinata carries with her everywhere.

Normally used to help people out of a pinch, like picking a broken lock.

Gear.Name: Inventory Management Ledger
Gear.Desc:
An inventory management ledger for the Trinity Cathedral made and maintained by Hinata.
Inside is a meticulous list of where the cathedral's supplies are stored and how many are available. Since Hinata generally finds whatever items people need herself, only a handful of people know of the ledger's existence.

Name: Marina
CharacterSSRNew: Running away doesn't help one bit!
ProfileIntroduction:
Chairwoman of the Security Committee in charge of Red Winter Academy's safety.

Though she's known as a cold-hearted disciplinarian, the truth is she just blindly follows President Cherino's orders. She likes the word "charge" and is the first to run off when a problem occurs within Red Winter Academy, but often loses her way due to her terrible sense of direction.

Skills.Name: Revolutionary Charge!
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in an donut-shaped area and decreases their <d:HealEffectiveness> by <?2> for 30s. Each hit knocks back enemies a distance of <kb:1>.

Skills.Name: No Retreat!
Skills.Desc: Once per battle, when Marina's HP falls below 20%, she becomes <s:Immortal> for <?1>.

Skills.Name: Evading Isn't Retreating!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:Dodge> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Evading Isn't Retreating!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1> and <b:Dodge> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: A Bold Decision
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:Dodge> by <?1> for the duration of Marina's EX skill.

Weapon.Name: Gray Balalaika
Weapon.Desc:
A submachine gun with a drum magazine adored by Marina.

Can smash those that doubt the Red Winter Office's authority with alacrity.

Name: Miyako
CharacterSSRNew: RABBIT 1. Begin the Operation.
ProfileIntroduction:
The leader of the RABBIT Squad at SRT Academy. Her call sign is "RABBIT 1."

Miyako originally registered for SRT Academy because of her deep admiration for its adherence to justice. When they suddenly closed down the academy, she was left homeless and camping out in a park with other RABBIT Squad members. She is to-the-point and rarely shows what she's thinking so can come off as uncaring, but has the kindest heart in the squad.

Skills.Name: Launch Flash Drone
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy and inflicts <c:Stunned> for <?2>.

Skills.Name: Claymore Burst
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, deploys a claymore that explodes into 5 fragments spread across a fan-shaped area in front of it, each fragment deals <?1> damage.

Skills.Name: Claymore Burst+
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, deploys a claymore that explodes into 5 fragments spread across a fan-shaped area in front of it, each fragment deals <?1> damage and decreases the <d:OppressionResist> of enemies hit by <?2> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Equip Special Bulletproof Plate
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Equip Special Bulletproof Plate+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:DEF> by <?1> and <b:MAXHP> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Disturbance
Skills.Desc: Decreases <b:DamagedRatio> by <?1> for 16s after Miyako uses her EX skill.

Weapon.Name: RABBIT Type 31 Submachine Gun
Weapon.Desc:
A submachine gun Miyako received from SRT Academy.
A highly reliable submachine gun, it can effectively annihilate enemies even in the most extreme situations.

Gear.Name: Threadbare Name Tag
Gear.Desc: Miyako's old nametag from when she was a trainee. It may be old and worn out, but it's a precious symbol of her dreams.

Name: Saki
CharacterSSRNew: Call sign, RABBIT 2. Sensitivity is good.
ProfileIntroduction:
The point woman of SRT Academy RABBIT Squad. Call sign is "RABBIT 2."

Saki enrolled in SRT Academy to live the life of discipline she'd always dreamed of. When the academy closed down, she, along with her squad, refused to give up on their school and began camping out in the park in protest. A star student, she still carries around her textbooks and SRT manuals to this day. She enjoys foraging for wild greens and trash that can be repurposed as supplies.

Skills.Name: Rain Support Fire!
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area and inflicts <c:Stunned> for <?2>.

Skills.Name: Suppressive Fire
Skills.Desc: Every 35s, deals <?1> damage to the enemy with the lowest HP and inflicts <d:Burn>, continuously dealing <?2> damage every 4s for 20s.

Skills.Name: Meticulous Maintenance
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Meticulous Maintenance+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Point Woman's Lead
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: RABBIT Type 26 Machine Gun
Weapon.Desc:
A standard machine gun Saki received from SRT Academy.
It's hard to maintain, but it guarantees great firepower as long as it's serviced well.

Name: Miyu
CharacterSSRNew: Th-This is RABBIT 4. D-Did you call...?
ProfileIntroduction:
The sniper of SRT Academy's RABBIT Squad. Her call sign is "RABBIT 4."

Miyu entered SRT due to her natural sniping talent, but struggled with her meek and shy temperament. Just as she found a home in the academy, it closed down and she joined the rest of her squad camping out in the park. Her lack of presence makes her a great sniper, but sometimes even her allies forget she exists.

Skills.Name: Observe Weakness
Skills.Desc: Applies to one enemy for 10s. Each time an ally attacks the enemy inflicted with this debuff, deals additional damage equal to of Miyu's ATK. (This additional damage cannot critically hit and can trigger up to a maximum of 120 times)

Skills.Name: Unexpected Blow
Skills.Desc: Every 5 normal attacks, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: Unexpected Blow+
Skills.Desc: Every 5 normal attacks, deals damage to one enemy and applies for 5s. Each time an ally attacks the enemy inflicted with this debuff, deals additional damage equal to of Miyu's ATK. (This additional damage cannot critically hit and can trigger up to a maximum of 50 times)

Skills.Name: Deep Breathing
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Deep Breathing+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> and <b:CriticalDamage> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Special Sniper Bullets
Skills.Desc: Whenever Miyu reloads, increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> for 13s.

Weapon.Name: RABBIT Type 39 Rifle
Weapon.Desc:
A standard rifle Miyu received from SRT Academy.
Precisely designed for a powerful single shot, it has a very high accuracy.

Gear.Name: サッドバニーポット
Gear.Desc: ミユがいつも持ち歩いているコンパクトサイズのポット。悲しそうな表情のうさぎが描かれたポーチに大切に保管されている。

Name: Kaede
CharacterSSRNew: As usual, I'm gonna work hard to become a proper lady!
ProfileIntroduction:
An enthusiastic member of the Hyakkiyako Academy Inner Discipline Club.

She used to be infamous for spreading mischief around town, but after meeting Tsubaki and Mimori by chance, she was inspired to be a proper lady like them and joined the Inner Discipline Club. Kaede never skips her training to be a proper lady, but still always seems to cause trouble.

Skills.Name: Fire the Flare!
Skills.Desc: Grants a <b:Shield> to all allies in a circular area with HP equal to <?1> of Healing lasting up to 16s.

Skills.Name: Herculean Beetle Shield!
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, increases the <b:DEF> of the ally with the highest DEF by <?1> for 33s.

Skills.Name: Herculean Beetle Shield!+
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, increases the of the ally with the highest DEF by for 33s. Also reduces own by an amount depending on the number of times this skill has activated (for 1 EX Skill use) 1 time: reduced by 1. 2 times: reduced by 2 3 times: reduced by 3 4 or more times: EX Skill Cost will not change.

Skills.Name: Healing Waves! Hyah!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Healing Waves! Hyah!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: I Can Try Harder!
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Funny Fireworks
Weapon.Desc:
A signal pistol Kaede always carries around.
Literally, it's a gun used to signal when something is found. Kaede mainly uses it when she comes across a bad student or a rare Mushiqueen card.

Gear.Name: ムシクイーンカードスリーブ
Gear.Desc: カードの損傷を防ぐために作られたスリーブ。その中でもカエデが初めて購入したムシクイーンカードスリーブの通常版。正式な大会では、カードスリーブを使わないと出場できないことが多いという。

Name: Iroha
CharacterSSRNew: Do you need me? Oh, well. All right, then.
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the Pandemonium Society.

There's nothing Iroha hates more than being bothered. She spends much of her time trying to figure out how to escape company. She even constantly carries a book around so people will leave her alone, but the Pandemonium Society (Makoto, to be exact) always interrupts her anyway. She begrudgingly serves as an executive of the Pandemonium Society, only finding comfort in their mascot, Ibuki.

Skills.Name: Let's Go, Toramaru
Skills.Desc: Deploys Iroha riding Toramaru for 55s, granting it an additional <?1> of Iroha's <b:ATK>. Only one tactical support vehicle may be deployed at any given time.

Skills.Name: Annoying...
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, fires shells at up to 4 enemies, each shell dealing <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area around the target.

Skills.Name: Do I Have a Choice?
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Do I Have a Choice?+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Please Do Your Best
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Pandemonium Society Standard Gun
Weapon.Desc:
A pistol Iroha carries around.
Since Iroha is the tank commander of the Pandemonium Society, she always complains that it's cumbersome to carry around something she never uses. But she still maintains it perfectly, which is typical Iroha-behavior.

Name: Michiru
ProfileIntroduction:
The president of the Hyakkiyako Academy Ninjutsu Research Club and admin of the video channel Michiruchi, a Girl's Ninja Scroll.

Michiru tends to operate from a place of complete, unfounded confidence. As a ninja otaku, she works tirelessly with the other members to make ninjas popular throughout Kivotos. Her dreams are to make the Ninjutsu Research Club officially recognized and to reach 100 subscribers on her video channel.

Skills.Name: Michiru's Ninja Scroll!
Skills.Desc: Launches a firework in a straight line, dealing <?1> damage to the first enemy hit and inflicting <d:Burn>, continuously dealing <?2> damage every 4s for 20s.

Skills.Name: Cry of the Exorcist!
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 20s.

Skills.Name: My Own Ninjutsu!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: My Own Ninjutsu!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and <b:CriticalDamage> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Secret Michiru-Style Ninjutsu!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>. Effect is increased by an additional <?2> for every other Ninjutsu Research Club student in the same unit (up to a maximum of 3 times).

Weapon.Name: Michiru-Style Overflow Shotgun
Weapon.Desc:
Michiru's favorite shotgun.

It's been modified in different ways, like putting an additional shotgun part under the muzzle so she could use ninjutsu bullets she made herself. Michiru says these are amalgams of her aspiration.

Name: Tsukuyo
CharacterSSRNew: I-I'm just a tall, good-for-nothing... But I want to do my best to help, Sensei!
ProfileIntroduction:
A girl from the Hyakkiyako Ninjutsu Research Club.

Tsukuyo is insecure about her towering height, as she was teased relentlessly for it as a child. She is timid and has a hard time speaking up, but also determinedly follows her goals once she's made a decision. While she doesn't know much about ninjas, she does her best for Michiru and Izuna so she won't let them down.

Skills.Name: Ts-Tsukuyo Ninja Scroll!
Skills.Desc: Gains a effect for 30s, restoring HP by of Healing each time Tsukuyo takes damage from an attack. (Effect can trigger up to a maximum of 100 times and Tsukuyo's is decreased by for the effect's duration.)

Skills.Name: Shuriken Practice!
Skills.Desc: Every 7 normal attacks, deals damage to one enemy. If the enemy is medium sized, decreases their by for 20s.

Skills.Name: I'm So Tall...
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: I'm So Tall...+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: I Can't Go Down Yet!
Skills.Desc: Whenever Tsukuyo is inflicted with a Crowd Control effect, restores own HP by <?1> of Healing.

Weapon.Name: Tsukuyo-Style Submachine Gun
Weapon.Desc:
A submachine gun cherished by Tsukuyo.

Tsukuyo isn't very familiar with guns, so Michiru and Izuna helped modify it bit by bit. She now considers it an irreplaceable precious treasure because of their efforts.

Name: Misaki
CharacterSSRNew: There is no answer in such a huge void. Nevertheless...
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the Arius Squad, she gives off a quiet, stand-offish impression.

Misaki has no interest in others' opinions or how they treat her. She can be reckless to a fault, and her wrists and neck are always covered with thick bandages.

Skills.Name: World of Futility
Skills.Desc: Creates 7 circular zones that each continuously deal <?1> damage to enemies inside them every 4s for 48s. If this skill is used again before the duration expires, the previously created points will disappear.

Skills.Name: Finish It Quickly
Skills.Desc: Every 50s, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 40s.

Skills.Name: Finish It Quickly+
Skills.Desc: Every 50s, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and <b:Penetration> by <?2> for 40s.

Skills.Name: Casual Technique
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Casual Technique+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Equivalent Exchange
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1>/<?2>/<?3>/<?4>/<?5> damage as an additional hit to enemies depending on the number of debuffs inflicted on them (up to a maximum of 5).

Weapon.Name: Saint Predator
Weapon.Desc:
Misaki's favorite portable missile.

Once it reaches a certain altitude, it splits into several submunitions and causes a wide explosion on the ground.

Gear.Name: 木の彫像
Gear.Desc: 幼い頃、サオリがナイフで彫って作ってくれた拙い木彫り。サオリ本人もすっかり忘れているほど古いものだ。

Name: Hiyori
CharacterSSRNew: Oh, I got lucky today. Heehee...
ProfileIntroduction:
An Arius Squad member that gives a gloomy impression.

Hiyori follows other Arius students around, always crying about her latest heavy burden. She has low self-esteem and a negative personality. She tends to be pessimistic about everything in the world, and believes the only purpose of life is suffering.

Skills.Name: T-Take This!
Skills.Desc: Fires a bullet in a straight line that deals <?1> damage to the first enemy it hits and decreases their <d:DEF> by <?2> if there are fewer than 3 Arius students in the same unit, or <?3> if there are 3 or more for 30s.

Skills.Name: Th-This Is Gonna Hurt!
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and decreases their <d:DEF> by <?2> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Magazine Knowledge
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Magazine Knowledge+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Bonus Power!
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Identity
Weapon.Desc:
A massive sniper rifle Hiyori uses.

Its 20mm bullets that accurately target enemies prove their power on the battlefield wherever bullets rain.

Name: Atsuko
CharacterSSRNew: I wish there were flowers on this path.
ProfileIntroduction: A mysterious member of the Arius Squad who always wears a gas mask. Atsuko's mask isn't necessarily meant for disguise but rather a gas mask she wears for protection and safety. The squad leader, Saori, calls her Hime. Very little is known of who she is.

Skills.Name: Is This My Power...?
Skills.Desc: Continuously restores the HP of allies in a circular area around Atsuko by <?1> of Healing every 5s for 30s.

Skills.Name: Let's Hide
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, creates a smokescreen at Atsuko's location that increases the <b:Dodge> of allies inside it by <?1> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Practice Makes Perfect
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:Dodge> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Practice Makes Perfect+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> and <b:Dodge> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: High Pain Tolerance
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:Dodge> by <?1> when under 30% HP.

Weapon.Name: Scorpius
Weapon.Desc:
A submachine gun Atsuko uses.

It has strong firepower and a short barrel, making it suitable for close combat.

Name: Wakamo (Swimsuit)
CharacterSSRNew: Heeheehee! I came here to find you, darling! ♥
ProfileIntroduction:
One of the Seven Prisoners. A girl who blooms like a colorful flower in summer.

She arrived on the beach in her swimsuit to show it off to Sensei and ended up with a huge smile on her face because she ran into Sensei just in time. Her passion toward Sensei is as strong as the summer sun. She always tries her best to get closer to them.

Skills.Name: Celadon Flower Divination
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy. Each hit inflicts <c:Stunned> for <?2> with the final hit inflicting <c:Stunned> for <?3> and knocking back the target a distance of <kb:1>.

Skills.Name: Just For You
Skills.Desc: Every 60s, gains one level of the following effect (max. level 3). Increases by // but also increases by 9.6%/19.2%/28.9% at level 1/2/3.

Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Uncontrollable Love+

Skills.Name: Midsummer Passion

Weapon.Name: Crimson Calamity
Weapon.Desc:
Wakamo's favorite rifle.

To match Wakamo's fiery mood in the hot summer, its muzzle shoots out a crimson flame hotter than the sweltering summer heat at everything that gets in the way.

Name: Nonomi (Swimsuit)
CharacterSSRNew: During the summertime, it's best to go to the beach with friends!
ProfileIntroduction:
An excitable member of the Abydos Foreclosure Task Force.

Always caring and kind, Nonomi looks after everyone, even when on vacation. She was so excited to head out to sea with others that she purchased one-too-many supplies, all out of her own pocket.

Skills.Name: Time to Cool Off!
Skills.Desc: Immediately reloads, deals damage to one enemy and augments to ignore attack delay times. Effect ends after consuming 100 ammo.

Skills.Name: Everyone Get Pumped!
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, increases the <b:AttackSpeed> of allies in a circular area by <?1> for 30s.

Skills.Name: I Can't Wait!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: I Can't Wait!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:Penetration> by <?1> and <b:AttackSpeed> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: It's Gonna Be Cold!
Skills.Desc: Normal attacks deal <?1> damage as an additional hit to enemies while <s:FormChange> is augmented by Nonomi's EX Skill.

Weapon.Name: Mini No. 5
Weapon.Desc: A machine gun that protects Nonomi on her beach adventures. The bullets blow away targets along with the scorching heat.

Name: Ayane (Swimsuit)
ProfileIntroduction:
The secretary of the Abydos Foreclosure Task Force who flew the group to the beach for summer vacation. 
She wants to forget about her arduous daily grind and have a pleasant vacation, but she can never hide her strong work ethic, even while relaxing.

Skills.Name: Water Cloud, Charge!
Skills.Desc: Deploys Ayane riding Water Cloud for 30s, granting it an additional <?1> of Ayane's <b:ATK> and <?2> of Ayane's <b:CriticalChance>. Only one tactical support vehicle may be deployed at any given time.

Skills.Name: Air Support
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy. This attack ignores <?2> of the enemy's DEF.

Skills.Name: Auto Aim
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Auto Aim+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Grasping the Situation
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Common Sense
Weapon.Desc: Ayane's pistol that she hoped she would never have to use. That wish is constantly shattered by their absurd adventures.

Name: Hoshino (Swimsuit)
CharacterSSRNew: Come here, Sensei. It's really cool here.
ProfileIntroduction: The Foreclosure Task Force president who flew to an uninhabited island to relax for summer. She always says she wants to sit around and do nothing, so she's perfectly prepared for summer. She's unaware that she looks a little more excited than usual.

Skills.Name: Surface Support
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and <b:EnhanceExplosionRate> by <?2> of all allies within a circular area around Hoshino as long as they stay within range. Effect lasts for 50s.

Skills.Name: Surface Attack
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and restores own HP by <?2> of Healing.

Skills.Name: Endure the Heat
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:DEF> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Endure the Heat+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:DEF> by <?1> plus a further <?3> and <b:ATK> by <?2> plus a further <?4>.

Skills.Name: Fun at the Beach
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CostRegen> by <?1> for the duration of Hoshino's EX skill.

Weapon.Name: Eye of Horus
Weapon.Desc: Hoshino brought this shotgun to the resort, modified for use at the summer sea. It's meant for various functionalities, like creating a path in the forest and chasing away bugs.

Name: Shizuko (Swimsuit)
ProfileIntroduction: President of the Festival Department, full of ambition and aspirations for the summer. The president's passion is to spread Momoyodou franchises all over Kivotos. Any difficulty or obstacle is no problem as long as she has Idol Punch. She has nothing to fear and is determined to achieve anything that's within her reach.
Hobby: Serving and charming customers, Idol Punch

Skills.Name: Summer Momoyodou Opening!
Skills.Desc: Repositions up to 4 allies in a circular area to the selected location and grants them a <b:Shield> with HP equal to <?1> of Healing lasting up to 30s.

Skills.Name: Are You Hot?
Skills.Desc: Every 45s, increases the <b:CriticalDamage> of the ally with the highest Crit DMG by <?1> for 36s.

Skills.Name: Sales Are Increasing!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Sales Are Increasing!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Cheer Up! Nyan!
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Sakura Bonbon
Weapon.Desc: A pump-action shotgun that Shizuko uses at the beach. The scent of anmitsu still lingers. Now's the time to spread that scent to the entire resort!

Name: Izuna (Swimsuit)
CharacterSSRNew: This summer I'm gonna train hard with my lord!
ProfileIntroduction: A member of the Hyakkiyako Academy Ninjutsu Research Club who went to the beach for summer training. She's a ninja who's always very lively. These days, she's 200% more energetic than usual, probably because she loves the summer sun. To become a ninja who's prepared for hot weather, Izuna is enjoying the summer with her lord, wandering around and claiming she's "training."
Hobby: Studying the art of ninjutsu, serving her lord

Skills.Name: Izuna Ninja Scrolls! Summer Style!
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy and applies <d:ConcentratedTarget> to them for 30s.

Skills.Name: Izuna-Style Bobble Bubble Technique!
Skills.Desc: Every 6 normal attacks, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and decreases their <d:CriticalDamageRateResist> by <?2> for 20s.

Skills.Name: My Lord! It's Summer!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: My Lord! It's Summer!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> and <b:AttackSpeed> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Secret Izuna-Style Summer Ninjutsu!
Skills.Desc: Every 25 times Izuna successfully lands a critical hit, increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> for 23s.

Weapon.Name: Izuna-Style Super Ninja Tool
Weapon.Desc: Izuna's favorite submachine gun. It's a state-of-the-art ninja tool! It's fully waterproof, so there's no problem using it in the ocean. Izuna can even shoulder massage her lord with it.

Name: Chise (Swimsuit)
CharacterSSRNew: The ocean is full of interesting things!
ProfileIntroduction: An airhead who's a member of the Yin-Yang Club. She likes to hang out in the sunlight. When she started wearing a swimsuit, her popularity skyrocketed and her following grew as strong as the summer sunshine. As expected, she doesn't seem to care about her popularity at all. Chise is spending a fulfilling summer with Sensei, looking for sparkles and poking turtles.

Skills.Name: Summer Beach Fever!
Skills.Desc: Fires 3 grenades that target up to 3 different enemies. Each grenade deals <?1> damage and inflicts <c:Stunned> for <?2> to the target and enemies in a circular area around them. If the target is already inflicted with a Crowd Control effect, deals <?3> damage and inflicts <c:Stunned> for <?4> instead.

Skills.Name: Beach Volleyball Shot!
Skills.Desc: Every 50s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and inflicts <c:Stunned> for <?2>.

Skills.Name: Beach Volleyball Shot!+
Skills.Desc:
Every 50s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and inflicts <c:Stunned> for <?2>.
Also increases Chise's <b:ATK> by <?3> for 40s.

Skills.Name: Take a Walk!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Take a Walk!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Getting Chills?
Skills.Desc: Chise's EX Skill also inflicts <d:Chill>, continuously dealing <?1> damage every 4s for 20s.

Weapon.Name: Type 575 Grenade Launcher
Weapon.Desc: Chise's favorite multi-grenade launcher. As part of a special summer collaboration, Chise engraved a haiku inspired by Sensei onto her ammo. It's a precious item unique to Chise, and it's not sold on the market.

Gear.Name: Treasure-Filled Pouch
Gear.Desc: A fancy bag that Chise takes to the beach. Kaho attached a name tag to make sure it doesn't get lost. Chise has filled the bag with countless keepsakes from the beach. Not all of them could fit, but the memories will still last forever.

Name: Saori
CharacterSSRNew: I'm still wandering the streets, but one day...
ProfileIntroduction:
The leader of the Arius Squad, an elite special forces unit within the Arius Academy. 

She has a cold side where she uses any means or methods necessary to achieve her goal, but she is passionate and she expresses her emotions honestly. She's an unrivaled expert when it comes to guerrilla tactics, but she lacks common sense in everyday life. It's said that the Arius Squad's combat power is the result of completing Saori's training from start to finish.

Skills.Name: Et Omnia Vanitas!
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy. This attack always deals critical damage.

Skills.Name: Oriented Shooting
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> for 16s and deals <?2> damage to one enemy. This attack always deals critical damage.

Skills.Name: The Fruits of Training
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: The Fruits of Training+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> and <b:CriticalDamage> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Responsibility of a Leader
Skills.Desc: Increases by if there are 2/3/4 Arius Squad students in the same unit (including self). Azusa also counts towards this condition.

Weapon.Name: Arius Assault Rifle
Weapon.Desc:
An assault rifle used by Saori.

Saori personally customized the item to make it more efficient. Once she aims its muzzle at her prey, they never escape.

Name: Moe
CharacterSSRNew: This is RABBIT 3. Where's the next bombing site?
ProfileIntroduction:
The operator of the SRT Academy RABBIT Squad. Call sign is RABBIT 3. 
She entered SRT Academy because she admired their massive firepower, but the academy was suddenly closed. She's currently living in a park with her platoon members. She's bizarre in that she enjoys blowing up and destroying things, but her ability as an operator is quite impressive. She's addicted to sugar and always has a lollipop in her mouth.

Skills.Name: Steel Rain
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a rectangular area and inflicts them with <d:Burn>, continuously dealing <?2> damage every 4s for 20s.

Skills.Name: Concentrated Gunfire
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, deals <?1> damage to up to 5 enemies and inflicts <c:Stunned> for <?2>.

Skills.Name: Doom-Inspired Pleasure
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Doom-Inspired Pleasure+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Operation Support
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: RABBIT Type 224 Pistol
Weapon.Desc: The standard pistol Moe was given at SRT Academy. Despite being a pistol, it has a rapid rate of fire and can empty a magazine in an instant.

Name: Kazusa
CharacterSSRNew: Oh, Sensei. I didn't expect to see you here.
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the After-School Dessert Club with a relaxed and quiet personality. 
She usually keeps to herself and tends to just go along with the other members' shenanigans. She'll grumble a lot about their constant chaos, but she secretly loves that about her friends.

Skills.Name: Sweet, Sweet Gunfire
Skills.Desc: Immediately reloads and deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: Old Habits
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 25s.

Skills.Name: Sugar High
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Sugar High+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: The First Taste
Skills.Desc: Whenever Kazusa reloads, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> but decreases <d:AttackSpeed> by 16.3% for 15s. Effect can stack up to 2 times.

Weapon.Name: Mabinogion
Weapon.Desc: A machine gun Kazusa's had for a long time. When asked about the origin of its name, Kazusa gets embarrassed and avoids answering the question.

Name: Kokona
CharacterSSRNew: I'm Kokona of the Disciplinary Support Department's Plum Blossom Garden! N-No! I'm a full-fledged instructor!
ProfileIntroduction:
A first-year student who serves as an instructor for the Shanhaijing Disciplinary Support Department's Plum Blossom Garden.
Although she should be in elementary school because of her age, she was recognized for her excellent learning ability and given the authority of an instructor. Her students often follow her around and call her by her name without her title, which she dislikes.

Skills.Name: Great Job
Skills.Desc: Restores the HP of one ally except self by <?1> of Healing. Also restores own HP by 101% of Healing and gains one <s:Stamp='Stamp of Praise'>.

Skills.Name: Looking Forward to the Next Time
Skills.Desc: Every 100 times a critical hit is landed by allies, restores the HP of the ally with the lowest HP (except self) by <?1> of Healing and gain one <s:Stamp='Stamp of Praise'>.

Skills.Name: Instructor's Sense of Duty
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Instructor's Sense of Duty+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:Dodge> by <?1> and <b:HealPower> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Plum Blossom Garden Method
Skills.Desc: When Kokona reaches 5 , reduces the of all allies except self for their next EX Skill use by 1 and restores own HP by of Healing. All are consumed after activation.

Weapon.Name: Lady's Elegance
Weapon.Desc: An assault rifle that's effective both in maintaining the dignity of a lady and fulfilling duties as an instructor.

Name: Utaha (Cheer Squad)
CharacterSSRNew: With burning passion!
ProfileIntroduction:
The Engineering Department president dressed in a special cheer outfit for the sports festival.

Despite how abruptly she was assigned to the cheer squad, she is dedicated to ensuring that her passion won't be overshadowed by that of any other cheerleader. Still, that same passion sometimes burns a bit too bright, causing her to lose sight of her original goal...

Skills.Name: Thundergun MK-III Enhancement
Skills.Desc: Upgrades Thundergun, augmenting its <s:FormChange> to deal <?1> damage for 90s and changing the activation condition for Utaha's Basic Skill.

Skills.Name: Passionate Gunfire
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

ExtraSkills.Name: Passionate Gunfire
ExtraSkills.Desc: Every 6 normal attacks while Thundergun's <s:FormChange> is augmented, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: Cheer Captain's Passion
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Cheer Captain's Passion+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Cheer Captain's Drive
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage as an additional hit to enemies inflicted with a debuff.

Weapon.Name: Meister Zero
Weapon.Desc:
Utaha's reliable submachine gun of simple design.

It's stored inside Thundergun so that she resists the urge to use it as a pom-pom.

Name: Noa
CharacterSSRNew: Will you come away with me to the realm of reason?
ProfileIntroduction:
Secretary for the Millennium School Student Council, Seminar.

Her main responsibility is to maintain Seminar's official records, but she also handles various other legal and administrative duties, such as overseeing patent applications and product evaluations for Millennium student creations. Her extraordinary memory allows her 
to almost perfectly remember anything she's read or heard once.

Skills.Name: Speedy Record-Keeper
Skills.Desc: Applies <d:ConcentratedTarget> to one enemy and decreases their <d:DEF> by <?1> for 40s.

Skills.Name: Found an Opening!
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: The Secretary's Leisure
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: The Secretary's Leisure+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and <b:MAXHP> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: The Secretary's Stubbornness
Skills.Desc: Whenever Noa uses her Basic Skill, increases <b:ExtendDebuffDuration> by <?1> for 13s.

Weapon.Name: Secretary on Record
Weapon.Desc:
A pistol Noa modified with a conversion kit.

Extend the stock and hold down the trigger and voilà, it's basically an SMG.

Name: Hibiki (Cheer Squad)
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the Engineering Department who puts on a cheerleader outfit for game days.

Hibiki's sewing skills are sharp thanks to her love of cosplay, so she designs and makes special event outfits for all the members of the Engineering Department. She made this particular cheerleader outfit a long time ago, so it seems to be a bit small in some places.

Skills.Name: This Might Be Hot
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area and inflicts them with <d:Cheerleading>, continuously dealing <?2> damage every 4s for 120s.

Skills.Name: Can You Hear Me?
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, increases the <b:ATK> of both Hibiki and the ally with the highest ATK by <?1> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Too Much Passion
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> but decreases <d:CriticalDamage> by 11.2%.

Skills.Name: Too Much Passion+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2> but decreases <d:CriticalDamage> by 11.2%.

Skills.Name: I'm a Little Shy...
Skills.Desc: Deals damage as an additional hit to enemies. Deals between 0.5× and 2× damage depending on the distance between the enemy and Hibiki.

Weapon.Name: Fancy Light
Weapon.Desc:
Hibiki's favorite mortar.

When she's cheering, she puts it in a caddie to make it easier to carry.

Name: Akane (Bunny)
CharacterSSRNew: My Master's maid... Well, I guess I'm your rabbit now.
ProfileIntroduction:
A C&C agent wearing a Bunny Girl costume as her disguise.

Even in unfamiliar environments, Akane keeps the team together, always in perfect uniform, and blazes their way forward with large amounts of C4. But she seems preoccupied lately... Maybe she's too excited about her new bunny outfit?

Skills.Name: Meticulous Preparations
Skills.Desc: Places a mine that explodes automatically when an enemy is in range, dealing <?1> damage. The mine lasts for 90s.

Skills.Name: Immaculate Cleanup
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: Close Capture
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Close Capture+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Rapid Support
Skills.Desc: Increases the of all allies who use Mystic type attacks by .

Weapon.Name: Silent Solution
Weapon.Desc:
This pistol is Akane's constant companion.

It's been customized to be perfect for infiltration missions.

Name: Yuuka (Track)
CharacterSSRNew: Perfectly prepared for this year's Kivotos Halo Festival!
ProfileIntroduction:
The Seminar treasurer, changed into gym clothes to participate in the Kivotos Halo Festival.

Despite having already suffered from a heavy workload preparing for the big event, all she needed was a good night's rest to be back in tip-top condition. As a member of Seminar, Yuuka wants to focus on being a calm, rational representative of the council and ambassador to Kivotos, but the competitiveness of her fellow students is more infectious than she would ever admit.

Skills.Name: R.S.G!
Skills.Desc: Repositions to the selected location and gains a <b:Shield> with HP equal to <?1> of Healing lasting up to 25s. Also places a flag at this location that repositions up to 3 allies and grants them a <b:Shield> with HP equal to <?2> of Healing lasting up to 25s.

Skills.Name: Rehydration
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, if Yuuka is not protected by a <b:Shield>, gains a <b:Shield> with HP equal to <?1> of Healing lasting up to 23s. If Yuuka is already protected by a <b:Shield>, increases <b:HealPower> by <?2> for 90s instead (effect stacks up to 3 times).

Skills.Name: Mathematical Game Strategy
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Mathematical Game Strategy+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> and <b:AttackSpeed> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Optimal Route Calculation
Skills.Desc: Whenever Yuuka stops moving, increases <b:EnhanceMysticRate> by <?1> for 20s.

Weapon.Name: Logic & Reason
Weapon.Desc:
A pair of machine guns used by Yuuka..

Yuuka is never without her logic or reason. Hopefully they won't weigh her down during the event...

Name: Mari (Track)
CharacterSSRNew: May we enter this field day as competitors and leave as friends...
ProfileIntroduction:
A student from the Sisterhood. She's dressed in track clothes to participate in the Kivotos Halo Festival.

She eagerly volunteered for the Executive Committee, believing deeply in the festival's purpose: wishing for peace in Kivotos. However, the festival has been mired in trouble and conflict, and, due to her dedication, Mari has been caught up by it too.

Skills.Name: A Tall Drink of Water
Skills.Desc: Restores the HP of allies except self in a circular area around Mari by <?1> of Healing.

Skills.Name: Sisters' Cheer
Skills.Desc: Every 45s restores the HP of both self and the ally with the highest DEF by <?1> of Healing and increases both targets' <b:DEF> by <?2> for 40s.

Skills.Name: Cheering Attitude
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Cheering Attitude+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:DEF> by <?1> and <b:HealPower> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Devoted Encouragement
Skills.Desc: When a target of either Mari's EX or Basic Skill has less than 30% HP remaining, restores their HP by an additional <?1> of Healing.

Weapon.Name: Piety
Weapon.Desc:
A pistol carried by Mari.

It's usually used for peaceful purposes, such as to signal the start of a match. However, at times Mari finds it inadvertently pointed towards troublemaking students.

Name: Hasumi (Track)
ProfileIntroduction:
Vice president of the Justice Task Force. She's wearing track clothes to participate in the Kivotos Halo Festival.

She joined the Executive Committee in place of Tsurugi, who's inexperienced with administrative work. Hasumi is trying to do her best and stay composed despite the president's excitement, but between troublemaking students and the smell of sweets coming from street vendors, distractions are everywhere.

Skills.Name: Iron Will Piercing Shot
Skills.Desc: Deals damage to one enemy. This skill will consume up to 2 additional units of skill cost, increasing the damage dealt by 30% for each additional unit of cost consumed. (EX Cost increase/decrease effects will be calculated using the base cost)

Skills.Name: Sport Shooting
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: The Spirit of Participation
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: The Spirit of Participation+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> and <b:CriticalDamage> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: The Excitement of Competition
Skills.Desc: Deals damage as an additional hit to large sized enemies.

Weapon.Name: Impalement
Weapon.Desc:
Hasumi's favorite sniper rifle.

Her gun sparks with the brightest fire when she's punishing injustice, even during the Kivotos Halo Festival.

Name: Himari
CharacterSSRNew: Haha! Is it finally time to shine for Millennium's super genius hacker?
ProfileIntroduction:
The former president of Veritas, a hacker club at the Millennium School, and the current president of the Super Phenomenon Task Force.

She styles herself as a super genius hacker, and claims she has a degree in Omniscience, which only three people have received in Millennium's history. However, no one's ever been able to confirm the existence of such a degree. Himari relishes this, believing that secrets make a girl more beautiful. None can deny that she is an extremely talented hacker with a strange taste for the occult.

Skills.Name: Hah! Look What I'm Made Of!
Skills.Desc: Increases the <b:ATK> of one ally by <?1> for 13s.

Skills.Name: You Might Be Surprised!
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to the enemy with the lowest HP and decreases their <d:Dodge> by <?2> for 23s.

Skills.Name: Clifftop Bloom
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Clifftop Bloom+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ExtendBuffDuration> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: True Worth of a Beautiful Super Genius Hacker
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:CostRegen> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Clifftop Bloom
Weapon.Desc:
Himari's pistol.

A gun with a simple and elegant exterior. Himari uses it sparingly. "A flower blooming on a rocky clifftop is an extraordinary sight. Just like that flower, I'm in bloom." - Himari

Name: Shigure
CharacterSSRNew: Do you need a place to warm up? Heehee... Just let me know.
ProfileIntroduction:
A student suspended from Red Winter Academy and on probation in Former Institute 227.

She was suspended for mixing alcohol into the school-issued kompot. She's an old friend of Nodoka from Spec Ops No. 227. The rumor is that she caused trouble on purpose after Nodoka was sent to Former Institute 227 as punishment in order to join her friend. Whether or not this is true, she loves homemade kompot and always carries a flask in her pocket.

Skills.Name: Shigure's Special Bottle Grenade
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a rectangular area and inflicts them with <d:Burn>, continuously dealing <?2> damage every 4s for 20s.

Skills.Name: How About a Drink?
Skills.Desc: Every 60s, increases the <b:ATK> by <?1> of the ally with the highest ATK (except self), but also decreases their <d:HIT> by 27.5% for 30s.

Skills.Name: Sweet Fermentation
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Sweet Fermentation+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and <b:CriticalChance> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Wild Intuition
Skills.Desc: Increases the radius of Shigure's normal attack area of effect by <?1>, but changes normal attack damage to <?2>.

Weapon.Name: Spring Punch
Weapon.Desc:
A multi-grenade launcher that Shigure is never without.

Anyone hit by the grenades will be knocked senseless.

Name: Serina (Christmas)
CharacterSSRNew: The Remedial Knights are here to deliver Christmas cheer! Merry Christmas to all!
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the Trinity Remedial Knights. She's dressed in a Santa outfit to celebrate Christmas.

She's spending her Christmas volunteering for charity work. Anyone who watches her singing carols and giving out her handmade gifts would think that she was an angel who came down from heaven for Christmas.

Skills.Name: Echo of Blessings
Skills.Desc: Increases the <b:CriticalDamage> of all allies except self in a circular area around Serina by <?1> for 50s. Also grants them one <s:Holiday> (max. 15 stacks, lasts until the end of battle) and increases their <b:EnhancePierceRate> by <?2> for each <s:Holiday> they hold for 50s.

Skills.Name: Assorted Gift Set C
Skills.Desc: Every 21 normal attacks, throws a random gift to each ally except self within range that increases their by an amount depending on the gift chosen. Green Box: for 30s. Red Box: for 30s. Teddy Bear: for 30s.

Skills.Name: Guardian Angel's Will
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Guardian Angel's Will+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:DEF> by <?1> and <b:MAXHP> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Holy Aegis
Skills.Desc: Whenever Serina reloads, increases <b:Dodge> by <?1> for 15s.

Weapon.Name: Tactical Therapy
Weapon.Desc:
Serina's special assault rifle.

It doesn't fire needles, but it carries a double dose of Serina's love.

Name: Hanae (Christmas)
CharacterSSRNew: Merry Christmas! Were you expecting Santa Claus? Your guardian angel is here instead!
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the Trinity Remedial Knights. She's wearing a Santa costume to celebrate Christmas.

Because she has a very active personality, Hanae needs a Santa costume that allows her freedom of movement. For a girl who finds everything exciting, Christmas is nothing less than a month-long festival. She carries bundles of presents everywhere she goes, and rings a bell to fill everyone with the spirit of the season.

Skills.Name: Time for Presents!
