Skills.Desc: Grants one <s:Holiday> to all allies in a circular area (max. 15 stacks, lasts until the end of battle). Also grants them <b:DotHeal>, continuously restoring HP equal to <?1> of Healing, plus an additional <?2> of Healing for each <s:Holiday> they hold, every 4s for 60s.

Skills.Name: Cheer Up!
Skills.Desc: Every 35s, increases the <b:HealEffectiveness> of the ally with the lowest HP by <?1> for 15s.

Skills.Name: Cheer Up!+
Skills.Desc: Every 35s, increases the <b:HealEffectiveness> of the 4 allies with the lowest HP by <?1> and grants them <b:DotHeal>, continuously restoring HP equal to <?2> of Healing for 20s.

Skills.Name: Chant of Blessings
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Chant of Blessings+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: I'm Rooting for You!
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Happy Smile Gun
Weapon.Desc:
Hanae's assault rifle.

Even on Christmas, a time of peace, her gun spreads joy.

Gear.Name: ハナエのプレゼント袋
Gear.Desc: ハナエのプレゼントがいっぱい詰まっている袋。人々が必要そうなものを、ハナエがたくさん詰め込んでいる。

Name: Haruna (New Year)
CharacterSSRNew: What's more appetizing than seasonal food? For the New Year, we could have osechi, ozoni, oshiruko... Oh, now I'm hungry.
ProfileIntroduction:
The president of the Gourmet Research Society, who got dressed up in a kimono for the New Year.

She believes all aspects of a situation are crucial for a gourmand: not just the time and place of the meal, but also wearing the appropriate outfit. Therefore, she has set out on the path of epicureanism wearing a kimono. She certainly seems elegant and refined, but...if she's served food that doesn't meet her standards, watch out.

Skills.Name: Gourmand's Rage
Skills.Desc: Sets off 5 explosions targeting up to 5 different enemies. Each explosion deals <?1> damage to the target, plus an additional <?2> damage to both the target and enemies in a circular area around them.

Skills.Name: Gourmand's Creed
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 30s.

Skills.Name: New Year's Viande
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: New Year's Viande+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:EnhanceExplosionRate> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Farewell Dessert
Skills.Desc: Attacks have a 20% chance to decrease the target's <d:DEF> by <?1> for 17s. 5s cooldown between activations.

Weapon.Name: Ideal
Weapon.Desc:
A sniper rifle used by Haruna.

She will have no partner more suitable than this gun as she continues the path of a true gourmand.

Name: Fuuka (New Year)
CharacterSSRNew: Did you have any New Year's Eve noodles? I hope everything goes well for us this year!
ProfileIntroduction:
Fuuka is dressed up in a kimono for the New Year.

She is hoping for peaceful days in the upcoming year, but given her surroundings, that doesn't seem likely.
Hobby: Making home-cooked meals, packing bento lunches

Skills.Name: School Lunch Club's Osechi
Skills.Desc: Reduces the <b:CostChange> of an ally for their next EX Skill use by 50% (The amount reduced is rounded down) and increases their <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> for 35s.

Skills.Name: Tasting Time!
Skills.Desc: Every 60s, grants a <b:Shield> with HP equal to <?1> of Healing to the ally with the lowest HP lasting up to 20s.

Skills.Name: The Best Bite
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: The Best Bite+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: School Lunch Club's Snack
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Lunch Club Defense Gun Type A
Weapon.Desc:
Fuuka's submachine gun.

Her wish for the New Year is that she won't have to use it, but the world doesn't always grant her wishes...

Name: Junko (New Year)
ProfileIntroduction:
Junko is wearing a kimono for the new year.

She went through the trouble of putting on a new outfit, and has been looking forward to New Year's food. Once she starts eating, she won't tolerate interruption.

Skills.Name: Craving Food
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: I Wanted to Eat...
Skills.Desc: Every 21 normal attacks, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: I'll Finish Quickly!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: I'll Finish Quickly!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: I Only Have One!
Skills.Desc: When Junko uses either her Basic or EX Skill, increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> for 20s.

Weapon.Name: Diner's Outlaw
Weapon.Desc:
Two assault rifles wielded by Junko.

They punish anyone who dares to get in the way of their owner's enjoyment of gourmet food.

Name: Mine
CharacterSSRNew: I'm Aomori Mine, Remedial Knights captain. Does anyone need medical assistance?
ProfileIntroduction:
The captain of the Trinity Remedial Knights. A true knight in shining armor, she's upright and resolute, but she has a radical side as well.

She has a reputation in Trinity: Mine destroys things, and her knights pick up the pieces. She spends her spare time maintaining her equipment and making snacks and drinks for get-togethers with her friends. Some say that she knows as much about black tea as Hasumi of the Justice Task Force.

Skills.Name: Prideful Conviction
Skills.Desc: Repositions to the selected location and deals damage to enemies in a circular area, pulling them up to a distance of towards Mine and decreasing their and by for 40s. The reduction to and is increased by 2.5× if the enemy is medium sized.

Skills.Name: Stern Verdict
Skills.Desc: Whenever <b:AidAttitude> expires, deals damage equal to <?1> of Mine's DEF to enemies in a circular area and decreases their <d:DEF> and <d:Dodge> by <?2> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Knight's Will
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Knight's Will+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:DEF> by <?1> and <b:MAXHP> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Unflinching Courage
Skills.Desc: Whenever Mine uses her EX skill, gains <b:AidAttitude>, restoring own HP by <?1> of Healing every 4s for 10s. If Mine is already under the effect of <b:AidAttitude>, increases her <b:CriticalChanceResistPoint> by <?2> for 20s instead.

Weapon.Name: Proof of the Cure
Weapon.Desc:
Mine's shotgun.

She always says that there are two sides to a cure.
Is this weapon one of them?

Name: Mika
CharacterSSRNew: Thanks for waiting! It's my turn to jump in! ☆
ProfileIntroduction:
The former leader of Pater, one of the allied factions that makes up Trinity General School.

A former Tea Party member and a childhood friend of Nagisa, another member of the Tea Party. When the two clash politically, she draws a clear line between their public disagreements and their private friendship.
She seems lively and cheerful, and she's never without a smile. However, her demeanor hides worries that she can't reveal, making her something of an enigma.

Skills.Name: Kyrie Eleison
Skills.Desc: Deals damage to one enemy. Damage increases by up to 2× the higher the current HP of the target.

Skills.Name: Call of the Stars
Skills.Desc: Every 5 normal attacks, deals <?1> damage to one enemy. Every 3 times this skill is activated, summons a meteorite dealing an additional <?2> damage.

Skills.Name: Gloria Patri
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Gloria Patri+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:EnhancePierceRate> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Benedictio
Skills.Desc: Mika's attacks always deal critical damage. Also increases <b:DamageRatio> by <?1> and reduces <b:DamagedRatio> by <?2>.

Weapon.Name: Quis ut Deus
Weapon.Desc:
Mika's favorite submachine gun.

It was originally an ordinary Trinity-made submachine gun before Mika decorated it with love. Now, it shines like a star in the dark sky. You can be sure it's had a role in everything Mika does.

Name: Megu
CharacterSSRNew: Is there a problem? Let me handle it!
ProfileIntroduction:
The backbone of the Hot Springs Department and foreman at their construction sites.

She believes with all her heart that demolition can solve any problem.
Her personality is bold and confident, and she's earned the trust of everyone in the Hot Springs Department due to her excellent demolition skills.

Skills.Name: You Like it Fiery, Right?
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area, increases <b:ATK> by <?2> and normal attacks will ignore delay for 30s

Skills.Name: Shall I Warm it Up?
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, creates a circular zone that continuously deals <?1> damage to enemies inside it every 1s for 10s.

Skills.Name: This is Light Work!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:DEF> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: This is Light Work!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:DEF> by <?1> plus a further <?3> and <b:ATK> by <?2> plus a further <?4>.

Skills.Name: Ah! So Refreshing!
Skills.Desc: Every 50 times an enemy is hit with an attack, restores own HP by <?1> of Healing.

Weapon.Name: Molten Meg-ma!
Weapon.Desc:
Megu's one-of-a-kind flamethrower. When she takes it out, it becomes like an extension of her.

No one else can handle it due to the immense amounts of heat it gives off. Its interesting name comes from a pun that someone made about her once.

Name: Kanna
CharacterSSRNew: I will serve the citizens faithfully.
ProfileIntroduction:
A police student in charge of the Public Peace Bureau at Valkyrie Police School.

She's better known by the nickname "Feral Hound," because she never gives up on a crime once it's in her sights. She'll investigate tenaciously until she uncovers the truth. People see her as hot-tempered because of her unusual, ferocious looks and her nickname, but in reality she's calm and down-to-earth.

Skills.Name: Public Peace Bureau Director's Resourcefulness
Skills.Desc: Deals damage to one enemy and inflicts for 15s. For the duration of the effect, of the damage taken from allies will be accumulated and dealt again as Piercing damage once it expires, up to a maximum of of Kanna's ATK. (This additional damage cannot critically hit.)

Skills.Name: Harsh Interrogation
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and decreases their <d:DEF> by <?2> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Feral Hound's Tenacity
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Feral Hound's Tenacity+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Public Peace Bureau Special Ammo
Skills.Desc: Increases the of all allies who use Piercing type attacks by .

Weapon.Name: Valkyrie Service Pistol No.17
Weapon.Desc:
The standard pistol that Kanna received from Valkyrie Police School.

Despite its rugged design, it's light and easy to operate. Kanna prefers it, since she spends more time on paperwork than fieldwork.

Name: Sakurako
CharacterSSRNew: Through every trial you face, I'll watch over you.
ProfileIntroduction:
The faithful head student of Trinity's Sisterhood.

Her sincerity shines through all her actions, making her trusted by many.
She'll take up any duty given to her with piety and serenity. However, when it comes to matters of fashion or everyday life, her traditional nature sometimes causes her trouble.

Skills.Name: Proof of Baptism
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy and applies <d:ConcentratedTarget> to them for 30s. Also augments <s:SilverBullet> to deal <?2> damage as an additional hit for 30s. (This damage can trigger additional damage from the Sub Skill)

Skills.Name: Sister's Demeanor
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Arbiter of Sin
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Arbiter of Sin+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:EnhanceMysticRate> by <?1> and <b:AttackSpeed> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Light Be with You
Skills.Desc: Deals damage as an additional hit to Special Armor type enemies.

Weapon.Name: Purifying Touch
Weapon.Desc:
A gun that's maintained with all the thoroughness and reverence that Sakurako possesses.

Others find it difficult to even touch.

Name: Toki
CharacterSSRNew: Leave it to me. I'm both the perfect agent and the perfect maid.
ProfileIntroduction:
The mysterious fifth agent of Millennium's secret spy agency, C&C.

Although she technically belongs to C&C, she's been Rio's exclusive maid and bodyguard for some time, so few know who Toki is. While she is a superior secret agent who's at ease with high-tech weaponry and technology, she seems to be a bit lonely as she always works solo.

Skills.Name: System: Abi-Eshuh
Skills.Desc: Toki engages , increasing her by , by and by 12.2% and immediately reloading. While in , changes Toki's EX and Basic Skill and pattern. Ends after 3 EX Skill uses.

ExtraSkills.Name: System: Abi-Eshuh
ExtraSkills.Desc: Fires 3 lasers towards the targeted enemy. The first and second lasers deal <?1> damage to enemies in a straight line towards the target, the third laser deals <?2> damage to the targeted enemy and <?3> damage to other enemies in a straight line range. This attack ignores <?4> of the enemy's DEF.

Skills.Name: Tactical Decision
Skills.Desc: Every 35s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

ExtraSkills.Name: Tactical Decision
ExtraSkills.Desc: Every 35s while in <s:CH0187Mod>, deals <?1> damage to one enemy. This attack will ignore <?2> of the enemy's DEF.

Skills.Name: Codename Zero-Four
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Codename Zero-Four+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Eye for an Eye
Skills.Desc: While in , Toki's EX Skill deals // damage as an additional hit for the 1st/2nd/3rd use of the skill (count resets when Abi-Eshuh mode ends). This additional damage ignores of the enemy's DEF.

Weapon.Name: Time of Secrecy
Weapon.Desc:
Toki's one-of-a-kind assault rifle.

With performance as exceptional as its appearance suggests, it can crush any obstacle and complete any mission. She didn't name it herself, but it's unknown who did.

Name: Nagisa
CharacterSSRNew: And how are you? Greetings from Trinity.
ProfileIntroduction:
The leader of Filius, one of the allied factions that makes up Trinity General School, and the host of the Tea Party.

Although she has a sweet and friendly demeanor, she rarely reveals her true feelings, so she's not very approachable. Her hobby is preparing tea and refreshments for tea parties. Many Trinity students long to attend her get-togethers.
Hobby: Collecting tea leaves, baking pastries, gardening

Skills.Name: Time On Target
Skills.Desc: Deals damage to enemies in a circular area. Also decreases the of Light Armor enemies before the attack hits by for 15s.

Skills.Name: Afternoon Tea
Skills.Desc: Every 50s, restores the HP of the ally with the lowest HP by of Healing. If the target is from Trinity General School, restores their HP by of Healing instead.

Skills.Name: Pride of Tea Party
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Pride of Tea Party+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Noblesse Oblige
Skills.Desc: Increases the of all allies who use Explosive type attacks by .

Weapon.Name: Royal Blend
Weapon.Desc:
Nagisa's favorite small pistol.

Its classic design fits the appearance of a host at elegant tea parties. It's essential for chasing away uninvited guests who demean the dignity of tea parties.

Name: Koyuki
CharacterSSRNew: When the plan falls apart, well... That's when life gets interesting!
ProfileIntroduction:
A brilliant yet troublesome member of Millennium's Seminar.

She's completely unaware of her unrivaled talent for mathematical decryption. She always sets out to test her luck. Even if she goes too far and lands in hot water, she never stops.

Skills.Name: Unexpected Variable
Skills.Desc: Randomly throws one of three bombs that deal a different amount of damage to enemies in a circular area, depending on the bomb chosen. Bullet Bomb: damage. Electric Field Bomb: damage. Explosive Bomb: damage.

Skills.Name: One? Or Two?!
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy that bounces and deals the same damage to up to two nearby enemies. Koyuki reloads immediately after activation.

Skills.Name: Do You Believe in Miracles?
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Do You Believe in Miracles?+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Butterfly Effect
Skills.Desc: When Koyuki activates her EX Skill, increases her by a different amount depending on the bomb chosen. Bullet Bomb: for 40s. Electric Field Bomb: for 40s. Explosive Bomb: for 40s.

Weapon.Name: Mulli-Gun
Weapon.Desc:
A machine gun that's been through the wringer alongside Koyuki.

Once, it was entirely submerged in seawater. During the repair process, its color changed. Other than that, it's still as sturdy as Koyuki, who never worries about such trivialities.

Name: Kayoko (New Year)
CharacterSSRNew: I hope I find some good music this year.
ProfileIntroduction:
Problem Solver 68's department head.

She dressed up for New Year's with the other members, and it's like she was born to wear the dress! She's obviously annoyed by all the commotion at the New Year's Eve event, but she'll always do her best to help out Problem Solver 68 with her brains and wit.

Skills.Name: New Year's Amulet
Skills.Desc: Increases the <b:EnhanceMysticRate> of one ally except self by <?1> for 40s and grants them the <s:Omamori> status effect.

Skills.Name: Kitty Cat Time
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, increases the <b:CriticalChance> of one ally except self by <?1> for 25s.

Skills.Name: A New Misunderstanding
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: A New Misunderstanding+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ExtendBuffDuration> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Reciprocal Relationship
Skills.Desc:
Every 200 times a critical hit is landed by allies, increases own <b:ATK> by <?1> and increases the <b:EnhanceMysticRate> of all allies with the <s:Omamori> status by <?2> for 50s.
(The <s:Omamori> status is removed from all allies after activation)

Weapon.Name: Demon's Roar
Weapon.Desc:
Kayoko always has this pistol by her side.

This pistol emits a tremendous roar with every shot. It's useful for not only taking care of rude clients, but also for chasing away bad luck in the new year.

Name: Haruka (New Year)
CharacterSSRNew: This year... I-I'm gonna work like there's no tomorrow...!
ProfileIntroduction:
An employee of Problem Solver 68.

She's excited to welcome the new year with those most important to her. She went out of her comfort zone dressing up so she could fit in with her other club members on this special occasion.

Skills.Name: Who Approved This...?!
Skills.Desc: Decreases the <d:CriticalChanceResistPoint> and <d:CriticalDamageRateResist> of one enemy by <?1> for 50s, and deals <?2> damage to them.

Skills.Name: A Proper Greeting
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, decreases the <d:CriticalDamageRateResist> of one enemy by <?1> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Unforgivable, Unforgivable!!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Unforgivable, Unforgivable!!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ExtendDebuffDuration> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: All Her Courage
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:CostRegen> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Blow Away
Weapon.Desc:
A shotgun Haruka uses to exterminate any "pests" that stand in her way.

She also uses it to exterminate real pests.

Name: Kaho
CharacterSSRNew: Allow me to show you Hyakkiyako's impeccable charm, Sensei.
ProfileIntroduction:
Vice president of the Hyakkiyako Academy and the Lead Strategist for the Tourism and Culture Public Relations Support Team.

A member of the Yin-Yang Club, she is in charge of Hyakkiyako's public relations and marketing. So, naturally, she's an avid fan of all things Hyakkiyako and cares deeply about the students who work together to build the culture she loves. Some students even whisper that Kaho feels more like the president than their actual president. In a pool of eccentric members, she's the only one with a healthy amount of common sense in the Yin-Yang Club and that alone makes her an invaluable part of the team.

Skills.Name: Fanatical Behavior
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: Disciplined Preparation
Skills.Desc: Every 50s, gains the effect of <s:Dado> and increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for <?2>.

Skills.Name: Disciplined Preparation+
Skills.Desc: At the start of battle and every 50s after, gains the effect of <s:Dado> and increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for <?2>.

Skills.Name: Unwavering Passion
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Unwavering Passion+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and <b:CriticalDamage> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Serene Relaxation
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage as an additional hit while under the effect of <s:Dado>.

Weapon.Name: The Lead Strategist's Expertise
Weapon.Desc:
Kaho is never seen without her rifle.

This rifle was custom designed with one purpose in mind: promoting Hyakkiyako's unique style and culture. Although it's made for publicity, it still packs a punch when putting troublemakers back in line.

Gear.Name: 生徒たちからの感謝状
Gear.Desc: 百鬼夜行の生徒たちがカホに贈った感謝状。額に入れて大切に保管している。

Name: Aris (Maid)
CharacterSSRNew: Bum bum bum! I am now Aris the hero, maid edition!
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the Millennium Game Development Department. She's wearing a maid uniform after being mistaken for a C&C member.

The maid outfit is a little different from what she'd usually wear, but she's determined to get used to it. A bright and cheerful honorary maid, Aris gives everything she has to complete her assigned missions.

Skills.Name: Aris, Clean Up!
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: Earnest Handiwork
Skills.Desc: Every 15 normal attacks, increases <b:EnhanceMysticRate> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2> for <?3>.

Skills.Name: Earnest Handiwork+
Skills.Desc: Every 15 normal attacks, increases <b:EnhanceMysticRate> by <?1>, <b:ATK> by <?2> and <b:CriticalChance> by <?3> for <?4>.

Skills.Name: Paycheck Bonus!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Paycheck Bonus!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and <b:CriticalDamage> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Class Change: Hero Maid!
Skills.Desc: Aris' normal attack changes to damage one enemy and deals <?1> damage as an additional hit.

Weapon.Name: Supernova: The Sword of Light
Weapon.Desc:
Aris' railgun.

She takes advantage of its sheer output and firepower to snipe any enemy that stands in her way. She has one mission in mind: to utterly crush her target!

Gear.Name: メイドのカチューシャ
Gear.Desc: モップ、メイド服、メイドカチューシャで成り立つ、「メイド勇者」の3大特徴の一つ……ということらしい。その中でもアリスが最も大事だと思っている装備。

Name: Toki (Bunny)
CharacterSSRNew: I am ready to commence operation at anytime. ...Is there a problem with my outfit?
ProfileIntroduction:
A dedicated C&C agent, Toki changed into a bunny costume to better camouflage her in infiltration operations.

Her specialty under Rio was never infiltrations, so she's a little nervous about these new types of missions. But regardless, she's excited to finally follow in the footsteps of her C&C upperclassmen, no matter how much she tries to hide it.

Skills.Name: Special Weapon: Gauntlet
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy.

Skills.Name: Covert Agent Tool
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and decreases their <d:CriticalDamageRateResist> by <?2> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Agent's Expertise
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Agent's Expertise+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Weapon Mastery
Skills.Desc: Whenever Toki uses her EX skill, increases <b:EnhanceExplosionRate> by <?1> for 20s.

Weapon.Name: Time of Secrecy
Weapon.Desc:
Toki's exclusive assault rifle.

Whether it's a standard mission or a top-secret operation, she'll dominate the field with her weapon.

Name: Yuzu (Maid)
ProfileIntroduction:
The president of the Millennium Game Development Department. She began wearing a maid uniform after being mistaken for a C&C member.

The new outfit might not have transformed her into an outgoing extrovert, but it did give her the confidence to leave her room! With scary and unfamiliar events occurring all around her, Yuzu does her best to overcome each obstacle with the Game Development Department's support.

Skills.Name: Infiltration, Start!
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area and then deals the same damage to enemies in a surrounding donut-shaped area. Enemies that overlap both areas only receive <?2> damage on the second hit.

Skills.Name: High Score Combo
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: Precise Coding
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Precise Coding+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> and <b:CriticalDamage> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Game Developers' Bond
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Nyan's Dash
Weapon.Desc:
Yuzu's grenade launcher.

It had to be designed to be able to fire grenades under any circumstances, considering her habit of trying to fight from the safety of her box.

Name: Reisa
CharacterSSRNew: The ace, hero, arbitrator, knight, and star. I am...Uzawa Reisa!
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the Vigilante Crew who tends to show up suddenly and unannounced.

Reisa is rambunctious and loud, so much so that she's often taken for a joke. But there's no one more passionate about Vigilante Crew activities than she is. She likes to make an entrance when she bursts on to the scene, and is always testing out different heroic introductions.

Skills.Name: Duel Me!
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area. Removes one debuff from self.

Skills.Name: Victory Pose!
Skills.Desc: Every 50s, gains <b:DotHeal>, continuously restoring HP equal to <?1> of Healing every 4s for 30s.

Skills.Name: I Can Do This All Day
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and <b:MAXHP> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: I Can Do This All Day+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?3> and <b:MAXHP> by <?2> plus a further <?4>.

Skills.Name: The Reisa Effect
Skills.Desc: Reisa's EX skill also decreases the <d:DEF> of enemies hit by <?1> for 25s and inflicts <c:Provoke> for 1s.

Weapon.Name: Shooting☆Star
Weapon.Desc:
Reisa's precious shotgun.

It's immediately obvious whose weapon this is with the carefully customized gun barrel. She may be small and cute, but her experience defending justice in Trinity makes her just as fierce!

Name: Rumi
CharacterSSRNew: Is anyone hungry?
ProfileIntroduction:
President of the Black Tortoise Promenade, a food district in Shanhaijing Academy.

Possessing exceptional operational skills, Rumi has grown the Black Tortoise Promenade from a run-of-the-mill food alley into one of the most sought-after food districts in Kivotos. This has made her a thorn in the side of the Shanhaijing Student Council, who is wary of the growth of independent factions. Rumi denies this and claims she isn't interested in anything other than cooking and advancing the promenade.

Skills.Name: World's Tastiest!
Skills.Desc: Throws fried rice to one ally except self, restoring their HP. The fried rice can bounce and restore the HP of additional allies (including self) who have not yet received it, up to 4 times. 1st & 4th targets: Restores HP equal to of Healing. 2nd & 3rd targets: Restores HP equal to of Healing.

Skills.Name: Business Safety Regulations
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.

Skills.Name: Merchant Guild President's Pride
Skills.Desc: Increases by 100 and by .

Skills.Name: Merchant Guild President's Pride+
Skills.Desc: Increases by 100 and by plus a further .

Skills.Name: Memorable Taste
Skills.Desc: Grants <b:DotHeal> to allies healed by Rumi's EX skill, continuously restoring HP equal to <?1> of Healing every 4s for 60s.

Weapon.Name: Learn the Old, Know the New
Weapon.Desc:
Rumi's favorite submachine gun.

Named after an old idiom that goes, "learn from the old to know the new." Rumi has always seemed more interested in the "new" aspect.

Name: Mina
CharacterSSRNew:
One must fight their own battles.
No good comes from involving others.
ProfileIntroduction:
Executive Officer of Genryumon, Shanhaijing's student council, and the Student Council President's personal bodyguard.

Despite her calm and collected demeanor, she's a hardcore classic noir movie buff. She likes to quote scenes and lines from movies, although often incorrectly. She gets into trouble trying to be cool at inappropriate times, but Genryumon members do their best to mitigate the damage.

Skills.Name: Well Matched
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy and decreases their <d:ATK><?2> by <?3> for 50s.

Skills.Name: Unstoppable
Skills.Desc: Every 8 normal attacks, immediately reloads and deals damage to one enemy. Deals additional damage depending on the number of debuffs inflicted on the target. 3 debuffs: damage. 4 debuffs: damage. 5 or more debuffs: damage.

Skills.Name: Stand Your Ground
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:Dodge> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Stand Your Ground+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HIT> by <?1> and <b:Dodge> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Determination
Skills.Desc: Whenever Mina uses her EX skill, increases <b:ATK>, <b:Dodge> and <b:HIT> by <?1> for 20s.

Weapon.Name: Wise Dragon, White Tiger
Weapon.Desc:
Mina's beloved two-handed pistols.

The White Tiger in her right hand and the Wise Dragon in her left, she affectionally calls these two her true comrades-in-arms. Perhaps emotion and reason can work in tandem at times.

Name: Minori
CharacterSSRNew:
All the pudding in Kivotos for the students
who fight the good fight!
ProfileIntroduction:
Head of Red Winter Federal Academy's Labor Party.

She dispatches and manages laborers wherever they are needed, including large-scale construction sites. Despite her ability to get any job done, she has a bad reputation with employers due to being prone to leading strikes and protests at the slightest hint of trouble.

Skills.Name: Onward and Onward!
Skills.Desc: Deals damage to enemies in a circular area. Consumes up to 3 additional units of skill cost, increasing the damage dealt by 35% for each additional unit of cost consumed. (EX Cost increase/decrease effects will be calculated using the base cost)

Skills.Name: United Will
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: Hand in Hand
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HIT> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Hand in Hand+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and <b:HIT> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Fruits of Labor
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:EnhanceExplosionRate> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Torch of Steel
Weapon.Desc:
Minori's favorite sturdy assault rifle.

As its name suggests, this simple assault rifle has continued to faithfully light up Minori's path of struggle.

Name: Miyako (Swimsuit)
CharacterSSRNew: This is RABBIT 1. We've just arrived at the ocean.
ProfileIntroduction:
The RABBIT Squad leader, who has come to a remote fishing village on an undercover operation.

She has come to the seaside town disguised as a tourist to investigate the boxed lunches it distributes to convenience stores.
With the hostile reactions of the residents and the fishy smell wafting through town, it's not exactly a tourist's dream. But still, she can't resist dressing for the beach with a cute swimsuit!

Skills.Name: Flying Drone Launch
Skills.Desc: Decreases the <d:CriticalDamageRateResist> of one enemy by <?1> for 50s and deals <?2> damage to them.

Skills.Name: UV Protection
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, increases <b:Dodge> by <?1> for 25s.

Skills.Name: Disciplined Training
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Disciplined Training+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:Dodge> by <?1> and <b:MAXHP> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Tactical Maneuver
Skills.Desc: Every 50 times an attack is successfully evaded, increases <b:CostRegen> by <?1> for 10s.

Weapon.Name: RABBIT Type 31 Submachine Gun
Weapon.Desc:
A submachine gun Miyako received from the SRT Academy.
It's incredibly reliable and can operate effectively in hot and humid environments.

Name: Saki (Swimsuit)
CharacterSSRNew:
This is RABBIT 2.
Commencing undercover operation.
ProfileIntroduction:
The RABBIT Squad's point woman, who is visiting a remote fishing village on an undercover operation.

Always focused on doing things by-the-book, Saki has come with a bag packed with everything needed for a mission, including her manuals. Despite being in a swimsuit, her work ethic remains the same.

Skills.Name: Throw Flare!
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy and decreases their <d:DEF>, <d:ATK> and <d:CriticalChanceResistPoint> by <?2> for 50s.

Skills.Name: Cover Fire
Skills.Desc: Every 15 normal attacks, deals damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area. Deals an additional damage to medium sized enemies.

Skills.Name: Precise Maintenance
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HIT> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Precise Maintenance+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ExtendDebuffDuration> by <?1> and <b:HIT> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Camaraderie
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> of self and Special students by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: RABBIT Type 26 Machine Gun
Weapon.Desc:
Standard machine gun issued to Saki from SRT Academy.

It frequently malfunctions in humid environments like the beach, because it's vulnerable to rusting. This isn't a problem to Saki though, who diligently cleans her guns with every use.

Name: Miyu (Swimsuit)
ProfileIntroduction:
The RABBIT Squad's sniper, who's visiting a remote fishing village on an undercover operation.

She brought her fishing tackle to blend in and spends most of her time at the docks. Occasionally, she catches an unexpected big fish and attracts the attention of other anglers, but...her natural lack of presence remains strong even in this peculiar village.

Skills.Name: Attack of the Seagulls
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> guaranteed critical damage to enemies in a rectangular area.

Skills.Name: Secret Strike
Skills.Desc: Every 70s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.

Skills.Name: Underwater Composite Ammo
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Underwater Composite Ammo+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Observation Status Report
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: RABBIT Type 39 Rifle
Weapon.Desc:
Standard rifle issued to Miyu from SRT Academy.

The simple yet sturdy construction of the bolt-action allows you to snipe down enemies in harsh sea winds without malfunctioning.

Name: Shiroko (Swimsuit)
CharacterSSRNew: I'm not excited. I'm doing what I have to do.
ProfileIntroduction:
The resident athlete of the Foreclosure Task Force, ready for her summer vacation at a deserted island resort.

Despite the difficulty of the situation, she gives her all to rebuilding the resort and gathering food. Even in a swimsuit meant for play, she doesn't lose her characteristic single-minded drive.

Skills.Name: It's a Big Catch
Skills.Desc: Decreases the <d:DEF> of one enemy by <?1> for 30s, and deals <?2> damage to them.

Skills.Name: "Coincidental"
Skills.Desc: At the start of battle, increases the of all allies except self by for 60s, and reduces the for their next EX Skill use by 1. Activates once per battle.

Skills.Name: Strangely Excited
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Strangely Excited+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Trained Health
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:CostRegen> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: White Fang 465
Weapon.Desc:
Shiroko's assault rifle, favored even at sea.

Thanks to the extra care taken on its maintenance, it can handle water and salt.

Name: Ui (Swimsuit)
CharacterSSRNew: Ugh. Ugh... Grr... This darn...
ProfileIntroduction:
The president of the Trinity Library Committee. She's investigating the ruins as part of a deal with the Sisterhood.

She doesn't enjoy the outdoors much, but she's taking the investigation seriously, as she has a passion for ancient manuscripts, ruins, and artifacts.

Skills.Name: Desert Island Cafe
Skills.Desc: Repositions up to 4 allies in a circular area to Ui's current location and increases their <b:EnhancePierceRate> by <?1> for 45s.

Skills.Name: Decisive Clue
Skills.Desc:
When Ui has 3 <s:OldBook>, increases all Striker allies' <b:EnhancePierceRate> by <?1> for 30s.
All <s:OldBook> are removed after activation.

Skills.Name: Seeker's Will
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Seeker's Will+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Clue Uncovered
Skills.Desc: Every 2 times an ally other than Ui uses their EX Skill, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 30s and gain one <s:OldBook='Clue'>.

Weapon.Name: Volume Suppressor
Weapon.Desc:
Ui's silenced rifle.

Even though she's on a deserted island, it's seen quite a bit of use.

Name: Hinata (Swimsuit)
CharacterSSRNew: Is that heavy? Would you like me to carry your bags?
ProfileIntroduction:
A girl from the Sisterhood who came to the island to help investigate the ruins.

Even in this idyllic environment, she has a natural tendency to help everyone around her. Of course, not even Hinata can resist the relaxing effects of the lazy ocean breeze.

Skills.Name: Overflowing Water Barrage
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area. This attack ignores <?2> of the enemy's DEF.

Skills.Name: Chilled Water Barrage
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, Throws a water balloon at an enemy that deals <?1> damage, bouncing to other nearby enemies that have not been hit yet, up to 6 times. This attack ignores <?2> of the enemy's DEF.

Skills.Name: Passion of the Expedition
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Passion of the Expedition+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:EnhanceExplosionRate> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Helping Hands
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Reverence
Weapon.Desc:
Hinata's pistol never leaves her side, even in the summer heat.

Useful for menial tasks, such as shooting fruit down from high places.

Name: Koharu (Swimsuit)
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the Make-Up Work Club who's come to spy on Sensei.

While she feels a sense of duty to keep an eye on things, she's not unhappy that she's basically on vacation.

Skills.Name: Caught Browsing
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: Stimulating Read
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> for 25s.

Skills.Name: Elite Sense of Duty
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Elite Sense of Duty+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and <b:CriticalChance> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Death Penalty for Indecency!
Skills.Desc: Deals damage as an additional hit to medium sized enemies.

Weapon.Name: Justice Black
Weapon.Desc:
Koharu's sniper rifle has been modified for an island environment.

It's surprisingly well protected against humidity and salt.

Name: Hanako (Swimsuit)
CharacterSSRNew: Oh... I'm soaked... ♥
ProfileIntroduction:
A young lady from the Make-Up Work Club who's come to the island for the summer.

Her outfit is unconventional, perhaps because she's comfortable with the people she's with. In spite of appearances, she has an honest, sincere side.

Skills.Name: Wet All Over ♥
Skills.Desc:
Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.
If Hanako's water gauge has at least 1 charge, consumes 1 charge and immediately redraws the EX Skill after activation.

Skills.Name: Take It All ♥
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area and creates a circular zone where enemies' <d:DEF> is decreased by <?2> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Midsummer Truth
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and <b:CriticalDamage> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Midsummer Truth+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?3> and <b:CriticalDamage> by <?2> plus a further <?4>.

Skills.Name: Filling Up
Skills.Desc: Whenever an ally other than self uses their EX Skill, charges the water gauge by 40%. Each time the water gauge fully charges to 100%, increases own <b:ATK> by <?1> for 20s. (The water gauge can hold up to 2 full charges)

Weapon.Name: Honest Wish
Weapon.Desc:
Hanako packed this assault rifle for the beach.

She acts like the name has a hidden meaning...

Name: Mimori (Swimsuit)
CharacterSSRNew: If only we could freeze this moment in time...
ProfileIntroduction:
The vice president of the Inner Discipline Club has changed into a swimsuit for the summer.

She's known for her gentle smile and kind demeanor, but dressing in swimwear has her a little more excited than usual.

Skills.Name: It's Summertime!
Skills.Desc: Deploys cover with HP equal to a set amount plus <?2> of Mimori's Max HP. Creates a circular zone around the cover in which allies' <b:AttackSpeed> is increased by <?1> for 20s.

Skills.Name: You Need This?
Skills.Desc: Every 50s, grants a <b:Shield> with HP equal to <?1> of Healing to the ally with the lowest HP lasting up to 35s.

Skills.Name: I'm Ready!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: I'm Ready!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> and <b:MAXHP> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: I'm Here for You
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Soft Resolution
Weapon.Desc:
Mimori's automatic pistol.

Her training to become a proper lady never ceases, even when she's at the beach in the summer.

Name: Meru
CharacterSSRNew: Get up... It's time...to draw...
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the Knowledge Liberation Front, a book club at Red Winter Academy.

 Unlike her club mate Momiji, she doesn't just read fan books—she creates them. Writing under the name "Meruri," she draws inspiration from the drama between her fellow students. Even the feud between the Trinity and Gehenna student bodies have made it into her pages, generating some notoriety outside of Red Winter Academy.

Skills.Name: Celestial Inspiration
Skills.Desc: Deals damage to one enemy and inflicts , continuously dealing damage every 4s for 30s, and for 30s. Each time an ally attacks the enemy inflicted with , deals additional damage equal to of Meru's ATK. (This additional damage cannot critically hit and can trigger up to a maximum of 480 times)

Skills.Name: Delusional Drive
Skills.Desc: Every 50s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and inflcts <d:Burn>, continuously dealing <?2> damage every 4s for 30s.

Skills.Name: Drawing Inspiration
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Drawing Inspiration+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Climax Catalyst!
Skills.Desc: Every 3rd normal attack will use enhanced ammunition, dealing damage.

Weapon.Name: Creative...Anguish!
Weapon.Desc:
A pistol specially crafted for Meru.

Its name is a bit on-the-nose, but she couldn't think of anything better...

Name: Momiji
ProfileIntroduction:
A literature enthusiast fighting to preserve knowledge in Red Winter Academy's library.

Most of her peers fight for bread and snacks, but she fights for books. Unfortunately, she's a serious otaku, which means that the Secrateriat rejects most of her requests to get more manga in the library... But does Momiji give up? Never!

Skills.Name: An Excellent Medium
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: The Power of Knowledge
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Collector's Will
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Collector's Will+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: The Journey Begins
Skills.Desc: At the start of battle, increases <b:ATK> by <?1><?2>.
Parameters: and the radius of Momiji's normal attack area of effect by 1.5×
and the radius of Momiji's normal attack area of effect by 1.5×
and the radius of Momiji's normal attack area of effect by 1.5×
and the radius of Momiji's normal attack area of effect by 1.5×

Weapon.Name: Library Rule #7
Weapon.Desc:
Momiji's RPG.

Treat your library books with respect and Momiji will never have to invoke this "rule"...

Name: Kotori (Cheer Squad)
CharacterSSRNew: Knowledge is always useful, no matter where you are!
ProfileIntroduction:
This member of the Engineering Department donned a cheerleading outfit to support her friends.

Her cheers are loud, upbeat, and—most importantly—filled with technical explanations.

Skills.Name: Festive Barrage
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area. Each hit knocks back enemies a distance of <kb:1>.

Skills.Name: Uh, About That!
Skills.Desc: Every 5 times an ally except self uses their EX Skill, increases the of all allies in a circular area except self by for 30s.

Skills.Name: Is That a Question?
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Is That a Question?+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HIT> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Happy to Help!
Skills.Desc: Each time the buff from Kotori's Basic Skill is applied to an ally, increases own <b:ATK> by <?1> for 30s. (Effect stacks up to 5 times)

Weapon.Name: Professor K
Weapon.Desc:
Kotori's machine gun, also known as EX-Plain.

She has made simple yet sensible (?) modifications for field day.

Name: Haruna (Track)
CharacterSSRNew: The more you move, the more appetite you'll work up. Shall we?
ProfileIntroduction:
Haruna has changed into her gym clothes for the Kivotos Halo Festival.

No matter where she is, Haruna's quest for food never ends. This time, she's set her eyes on the culinary delights that can only be found at Kivotos' biggest athletic event. Maybe it's because of the excitement in the air, but she seems even more friendly than usual.

Skills.Name: The Gourmand's Proposal
Skills.Desc: Repositions up to 4 allies in a circular area to the selected location and restores their HP by <?1> of Healing.

Skills.Name: Cautious Approach
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, deals <?1> damage to up to 6 enemies and decreases their <d:DEF> by <?2> for 20s.

Skills.Name: Fromage Blanc
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Fromage Blanc+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Athlete's Dinner
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Ideal
Weapon.Desc:
Haruna's sniper rifle.

She's always scoping out good food, even while exercising.

Name: Ichika
CharacterSSRNew: Oh? It's not time for us to meet yet, is it? Were you waiting?
ProfileIntroduction:
A member of the Justice Task Force with a relaxed demeanor.

As a member of the task force, she excels at promoting cooperation and coordination. She's even on good terms with the students of the other academies. While she is known for her easy-going demeanor and friendliness, these traits don't come naturally to her and require a lot of work.
Hobby: Helping others and trying new things

Skills.Name: I Have a Request
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.

Skills.Name: Justice Task Force Network
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, increases <b:EnhanceSonicRate> by <?1> for <?2>.

Skills.Name: Keen Instincts
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HIT> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Keen Instincts+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and <b:HIT> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: It Was Inevitable
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage as an additional hit to enemies not taking cover.

Weapon.Name: Red Dragon
Weapon.Desc:
Ichika and this assault rifle have been together through thick and thin.

Despite its unassuming appearance, it is capable of unleashing intense power.

Name: Kasumi
CharacterSSRNew: Have I ever told you the true meaning of hot spring development?
ProfileIntroduction:
The president of the Gehenna Hot Springs Department.

Her mission in life is to develop hot springs wherever there is geothermal activity, and she doesn't care what's in the way. She enjoys the unanimous support of her club members, but outside of her club she is a wanted criminal.

Skills.Name: Giant Heel Crush
Skills.Desc: Decreases the <d:DEF> of enemies in a circular area by <?1> for 25s and deals <?2> damage to them.

Skills.Name: It's About Sending A Message
Skills.Desc: Every 35s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: Madman Theory
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Madman Theory+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> and <b:CriticalChance> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Have the Drills Stopped Screaming?
Skills.Desc:
Each use of Kasumi's EX skill grants one <s:CH0089_ExtraPassive>. Upon reaching 3 stacks, deals an additional <?1> damage to the target(s) of Kasumi's EX skill.
All <s:CH0089_ExtraPassive> stacks are removed after activation.

Weapon.Name: Red Rector
Weapon.Desc:
Kasumi is never without this handgun.

She mostly fires it into the air in order to spice things up. Despite its small, cute design, it's actually very powerful...and loud.

Name: Shigure (Hot Spring)
CharacterSSRNew: We've soaked our outsides, so now it's time to soak our insides.
ProfileIntroduction:
A Spec Ops student who helps run Hot Spring Resort No. 227.

When a hot spring suddenly erupted in the Former Institute, she and Nodoka opened a huge hot spring resort. Unlike Nodoka, however, she doesn't seem to be too interested in expanding the business or making money. She's thrilled for the opportunity to make all kinds of drinks and refreshments for their customers, however.

Skills.Name: Shigure's Special Fruit Milk
Skills.Desc: Continuously restores the HP of allies in a circular area by <?1> of Healing every 4s for 30s.

Skills.Name: Want a Bite?
Skills.Desc: Every 50s, restores the HP of the 4 allies with the lowest HP by <?1> of Healing.

Skills.Name: Four-and-a-Half Tatami Mats
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Four-and-a-Half Tatami Mats+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: Sharp Aftertaste
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Spring Punch
Weapon.Desc:
Shigure's multi-shot grenade launcher.

The sight of her skillfully reloading grenades is supposedly one of the key attractions at Hot Springs No. 227.

Name: Misaka Mikoto
CharacterSSRNew: This place is seriously busy.
ProfileIntroduction:
A student at Tokiwadai Middle School.

Misaka is one of the seven Level 5 espers in Academy City, a place populated by students with supernatural abilities. As an Electromaster, she has the power to manipulate powerful currents of electricity, but she has had difficulty using this power since arriving in Kivotos. She is easy to talk to and has a kind heart, so she tends to get along with others. She's also a fan of a cartoon frog from her world called Gekota.

Skills.Name: The Railgun of Tokiwadai
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a straight line.

Skills.Name: It's Going to Sting!
Skills.Desc: Every 50s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area and inflicts them with <d:ElectricShock>, continuously dealing <?2> damage every 4s for <?3>.

Skills.Name: Electromagnetic Manipulation
Skills.Desc:
Increases <b:HIT> by <?1>.
Immune to the <c:Confusion> effect from Shokuhou Misaki's EX Skill.

Skills.Name: Electromagnetic Manipulation+
Skills.Desc:
Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and <b:HIT> by <?2>.
Immune to the <c:Confusion> effect from Shokuhou Misaki's EX Skill.

Skills.Name: Don't Make Me Repeat Myself
Skills.Desc: Whenever Misaka Mikoto uses her Basic Skill, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for <?2>.

Weapon.Name: Gunbolt
Weapon.Desc:
A specialized firearm made for Misaka Mikoto by the Engineering Department.

Its special features were designed to make use of the user's electrical abilities.

Name: Shokuhou Misaki
CharacterSSRNew: Hmmm... What to do? And what's the story here?
ProfileIntroduction:
A spirited student from Tokiwadai Middle School.

As one of only seven Level 5 espers in Academy City, she leads the largest faction at Tokiwadai Middle School. Her ability, Mental Out, lets her manipulate the minds of those around her, though she's had trouble using this ability since arriving in Kivotos. She has something of a rivalry with fellow Level 5 esper Misaka Mikoto, who also happens to be immune to her influence.

Skills.Name: Mental Out
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to both the targeted enemy and the two closest enemies to them within a circular area and inflicts <c:Confusion> for <?2>.

Skills.Name: Assist Me for a Moment
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: Queen of Tokiwadai
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:OppressionPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Queen of Tokiwadai+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and <b:OppressionPower> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: I'm Very Clever, You Know
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:DEF> and <b:Dodge> by <?1> for 20s whenever Shokuhou Misaki's EX Skill inflicts <c:Confusion> on a target.

Weapon.Name: Mental Pointer
Weapon.Desc:
An exclusive firearm made for Shokuhou Misaki by the Engineering Department.

This pretty pistol is a perfect fashion accessory.

Name: Saten Ruiko
ProfileIntroduction:
A cheerful student from Sakugawa Middle School.

She was introduced to Misaka Mikoto, an upperclassman from Tokiwadai Middle School, by her good friend and classmate Uiharu Kazari. Although she is a Level 0 without any powers, she has good instincts and a knack for tracking down clues. Her favorite things are urban legends and desserts. She makes a point of trying out new desserts in her free time.
Hobby: Online mahjong, hunting down new desserts

Skills.Name: Bat Full Swing
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: Secret Weapon: Mackerel Curry
Skills.Desc: Every 45s, increases the <b:ATK> of one ally by <?1> for 20s. The number of allies affected increases by 1 with each subsequent activation of the skill, up to a maximum of 3.

Skills.Name: More Power!
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: More Power!+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: I'm Here Too...!
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Bullet Swinger
Weapon.Desc:
A personalized firearm made for Saten Ruiko by the Engineering Department.

Sturdy enough to be used as a makeshift bludgeon.

Name: Yukari
CharacterSSRNew: It's time! Here I come!
ProfileIntroduction:
A first-year member of Hyakkiyako's Hyakkaryouran Resolution Council.

Despite being a descendant of the historic Kadenokouji family, she admired the Hyakkaryouran and joined them instead of following her duties. She has a strong sense of pride in being a member, and nothing can stop her from doing all she can to serve the council. It's not an easy path, but she's strong and easily brushes things off. She really looks up to the upperclassmen of Hyakkaryouran, especially Nagusa.

Skills.Name: Blooming Resolution
Skills.Desc: Deals damage to enemies in a circular area. Consumes in multiples of 10, dealing an additional guaranteed critical damage for every 10 consumed.

Skills.Name: Long-Awaited Reunion
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, gain <?1> <s:Pray> (max. 50 stacks) and increases <b:ATK> by <?2> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Hyakkaryouran's Elite
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Hyakkaryouran's Elite+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and <b:CriticalDamage> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Bear the Responsibility
Skills.Desc: Obtains an <s:Pray='Invocation'> for each unit of skill cost consumed by allies except self (max. 50 stacks). Each time 10 <s:Pray> are obtained, increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> for 15s.

Weapon.Name: Hyakkaryouran Rifle - A Girl's Determination
Weapon.Desc:
Yukari's standard-issue Hyakkaryouran rifle.

These standard rifles were objects of admiration for her back in middle school. Finally owning one is proof of how hard she's worked to achieve her dream. She's known for her limitless determination.

Name: Renge
CharacterSSRNew: We're the authors of my youth, Sensei!
ProfileIntroduction:
The Assault Squad Captain of Hyakkiyako Academy's Hyakkaryouran Resolution Council.

Renge has a strong sense of justice and duty. She is often called Hyakkaryouran's Disciplinarian because of her strict teaching methods. She is soft-hearted and cares deeply for her underclassmen. She's always taken pride in her Hyakkaryouran responsibilities and has cherished every moment with the club. However, Renge sometimes regrets watching her youth pass her by while she was immersed in her duties. She's passionate about training and marksmanship, but is an idealist who dreams of a life like the ones she sees in mangas and movies.

Skills.Name: Hyakkaryouran Marksmanship
Skills.Desc: Inflicts <d:Burn> on enemies in a fan-shaped area, continuously dealing <?1> damage every 4s for 20s, and deals <?2> damage to them.

Skills.Name: Burning Passion
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, gains the effect of <s:CH0224_Public> and increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 22s.

Skills.Name: Hyakkaryouran's Disciplinarian
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Hyakkaryouran's Disciplinarian+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: A Commander's Duty
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage as an additional hit when attacking while under the effect of <s:CH0224_Public>.

Weapon.Name: Hyakkaryouran Rifle: Blazing Youth
Weapon.Desc:
Renge's favorite rifle.

A ceremonial Hyakkaryouran rifle, modified to fit her unique style. It's a trusty companion that's never failed her. Paired with her excellent marksmanship, she's a deadly threat in battle.

Name: Kikyou
CharacterSSRNew:
You won't regret standing by my side.
I'll prove my worth.
ProfileIntroduction:
Operations Officer of Hyakkiyako Academy's Hyakkaryouran Resolution Council.

Kikyou values logic and reason above all else. This combined with her deep loyalty to the Hyakkaryouran can make her a terrifying foe to face. She may be the mastermind behind all Hyakkaryouran strategy and operations, but she would never sacrifice an ally's safety for a victory. To her, there are only enemies or allies. Her ruthlessness terrifies her foes, while her kindness endears her to her fellow club members.
Hobby: Spinning yarn, reading military history, sunbathing

Skills.Name: Heavenly Tactics
Skills.Desc: Decreases the <d:DEF> of enemies in a cross-shaped area by <?1> for 30s, and deals <?2> damage to them.

Skills.Name: Know Thyself and Thy Enemy, Conquer a Hundred Battles
Skills.Desc: Every 35s, increases the of all allies except self in a circular area by an amount depending on the number of allies that are affected, for 25s. 1 ally: . 2 allies: . 3 or more allies: .

Skills.Name: Tactician's Expertise
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Tactician's Expertise+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ExtendDebuffDuration> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Furin Kazan Strategy
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, increases by for 20s and gains one stack of (max. 3 stacks). When at 3 stacks of , activating the EX Skill will additionally consume all stacks of and reduce the of all allies except self by 1 (for 1 EX Skill use).

Weapon.Name: Hyakkaryouran Rifle - Keen Wisdom
Weapon.Desc:
A rifle Kikyou is never seen without.

As operations officer of the Hyakkaryouran, she's rarely on the front lines. But when she is, her smarts and this trusty weapon always lead her to victory.

Name: Eimi (Swimsuit)
CharacterSSRNew: Out on the sea, a swimsuit is a must!
ProfileIntroduction:
An agent of Millennium's Super Phenomenon Task Force.

She's usually difficult to understand, but her unexpected excitement for this icy trip is easy to see. However, her fashion sense remains as bizarre as ever.

Skills.Name: Dependable Aid
Skills.Desc: Repositions up to 6 allies in a circular area to the selected location, granting them a <b:Shield> with HP equal to <?1> of Healing lasting up to 30s<?2>.

Skills.Name: An Eimi Original
Skills.Desc: Every 45s, increases the <b:AttackSpeed> of 4 allies by <?1> for 25s.

Skills.Name: Fish in Water
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:HealPower> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Fish in Water+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ExtendBuffDuration> by <?1> and <b:HealPower> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Slippery Slope
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: Tactical Multi-Tool
Weapon.Desc:
Eimi's favorite shotgun with a crude design.

Multifaceted like its name suggests, it can be used for various purposes even in extreme environments.

Name: Kotama (Camp)
CharacterSSRNew: I've been waiting to hear your footsteps come closer, Sensei.
ProfileIntroduction:
Veritas' surveillance expert dressed for cold weather.

Kotama was resistant to Chihiro's demands that the Veritas members experience the outdoors at first, but she's excited for the chance to record the many sounds of nature. She really enjoys the different ambiences she's found during the trip, but the sound of Sensei's voice is still her favorite.

Skills.Name: Bear Bell Toss
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy and inflicts <c:Confusion> for <?2>.

Skills.Name: Resonance Effect
Skills.Desc: Every 45s, increases the <b:ATK> of both self and one other ally by <?1> for 35s.

Skills.Name: Sound Amplification
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Sound Amplification+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:OppressionPower> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Transmission Interference
Skills.Desc: Deals <?1> damage as an additional hit when attacking enemies.

Weapon.Name: Echo Link
Weapon.Desc:
A pistol that Kotama always has tucked away into her belt.

She's modified the silencers to make firing a bullet so quiet she won't disturb the wildlife.

Name: Hare (Camp)
CharacterSSRNew: A can of Frenzy MAX should always be enjoyed cold!
ProfileIntroduction:
This Veritas member is bundled up to withstand the winter's cold.

Hare can't remember the last time she's left the confines of her desk, and she can't help but be a little nervous at a campsite with no Wi-Fi. While she's accepted losing most of her creature comforts, she draws the line at no cans of Frenzy MAX.

Skills.Name: Campfire Delicacies
Skills.Desc:
Increases the <b:ATK> of one ally except self by <?1> for 26s.
Additionally, grants 5 <s:CH0233_ExtraPassive> to self (max. 15 stacks)

Skills.Name: Share the Warmth
Skills.Desc: Every 50s, increases the <b:ATK> of all allies in a circular area by <?1> for 30s.

Skills.Name: Caffeine Withdrawals
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: Caffeine Withdrawals+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ExtendBuffDuration> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: Joys of Camping
Skills.Desc: While holding stacks of <s:CH0233_ExtraPassive>, deals <?1> damage as an additional hit when attacking enemies (consumes 1 stack of <s:CH0233_ExtraPassive>).

Weapon.Name: Auto-Hunt
Weapon.Desc:
Hare's bullpup assault rifle.

It's been modded for the outdoors with various new features: ignition for starting a campfire and an automatic bear-targetting feature. It couldn't account for user panic when Hare actually encountered a bear however.

Name: Ako (Dress)
CharacterSSRNew: 今回のミッションに隙なんてありませんとも
ProfileIntroduction:
ゲヘナ学園所属、風紀委員会の行政官であり、風紀委員長ヒナにとって秘書のような存在。

ゲヘナのパーティーでもヒナを補佐すべく、ドレスを着ることになった。日頃から丁寧な仕事ぶりで多くの風紀委員から尊敬されている。今回は完璧なエージェントとして活躍する予定である……とアコは自信満々に語っている。

Skills.Name: 完璧なエージェント
Skills.Desc: Increases the <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> and <b:CriticalDamage> by <?2> of all allies in a circular area for 30s. Grants 1 stack of <s:CH0231_ExtraPassive> to self for each ally affected (max. 15 stacks).

Skills.Name: ターゲットは逃しません！
Skills.Desc: Every 35s, decreases the of one enemy by for 22s. Also deals damage to the target depending on the number of stacks of held: 3 or fewer stacks: damage. 4~7 stacks: damage. 8~11 stacks: damage. 12 or more stacks: damage.

Skills.Name: エージェントの自信
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: エージェントの自信+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and <b:MAXHP> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: 作戦の成果
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for each stack of <s:CH0231_ExtraPassive> held.

Weapon.Name: ホットショット
Weapon.Desc:
アコが携帯している拳銃。

行政官としての能力を証明するもの。アコがいつも大切に扱っている銃であると同時に、今はゲヘナの特別なエージェントの秘密兵器として活躍している……という設定が増えている。

Name: Ibuki
ProfileIntroduction:
ゲヘナ学園所属、「万魔殿」の議員であり、マスコット的な少女。

元々ゲヘナ学園初等部所属だったが、能力を認められゲヘナでも優秀な生徒のみが入れるという「万魔殿」に加入した。「万魔殿」の中では最年少だが、ひたむきな可愛さで皆から愛されている。その分、先輩たちの迷惑にならないよう、今日も頑張っている品行方正な女の子。
Hobby: 予習・復習、ぬいぐるみ集め

Skills.Name: イブキのお絵描きタイム！
Skills.Desc: Increases the <b:ATK> of all allies except self in a circular area by <?1> for 35s.

ExtraSkills.Name: イロハ先輩とパトロール！
ExtraSkills.Desc: While Ibuki is aboard Iroha's Toramaru, Toramaru deals damage to enemies in a circular area.

Skills.Name: 悪い子はメッだよ！
Skills.Desc: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and decreases their <d:ATK> by <?2> for 20s.

Skills.Name: 品行方正な女の子
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: 品行方正な女の子+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: 万魔殿のマスコット
Skills.Desc: EX Skill also restores own HP by <?1> of Healing each time it is activated.

Weapon.Name: バンバーン！ちゃん
Weapon.Desc:
イブキが大切にしている銃。

「万魔殿」の先輩から受け継いだ制式小銃に、イブキがお気に入りのステッカーを貼ったり、アクセサリーをつけたもの。イブキにとってかけがえのない大切な宝物なのだとか。

Name: Makoto
CharacterSSRNew:
さあ！先生よ！
我々「万魔殿」と共に邁進する時だ！
ProfileIntroduction:
ゲヘナ学園所属、「万魔殿」の議長。

欲しいものがあれば、どんな謀も厭わない、欲望に忠実な野心家であり陰謀家。時にはその態度のせいで痛い目に遭い挫けることも多いが、すぐさま立ち直る芯の強い少女。イブキを妹のように可愛がっており、同じくイロハのことも妹のようにこき使っている。
Hobby: 計略、悪巧み、イブキと遊ぶこと

Skills.Name: ま、間違えたあ！
Skills.Desc: Deals damage to enemies in a circular area. The amount of damage dealt depends on the number of enemies within the area: 4 or fewer: damage 5~9: damage 10 or more: damage.

Skills.Name: 聞くが良い！
Skills.Desc: Every 55s, decreases the <d:DEF> of enemies in a circular area by <?1> for 35s.

Skills.Name: 万魔殿の偉大な議長
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: 万魔殿の偉大な議長+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: 天下無敵！ゲヘナの真のリーダー！
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:EnhancePierceRate> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: 唯我独尊
Weapon.Desc:
マコトが使用するスナイパーライフル。

自身の権威を示すべく、ゲヘナでも有名な職人に直接依頼して作った正真正銘の逸品である。だが、マコト自身は表に出るより、後ろから指示するのを好むことから、実際に使用することは滅多にない模様。

Name: Hina (Dress)
CharacterSSRNew: あなたのために、頑張るわ
ProfileIntroduction:
パーティーに参加すべくドレスに着替えた、ゲヘナ学園所属の風紀委員長。

基本的には面倒くさがり屋さんの少女だが、先生がゲヘナのパーティーを楽しみにしているという話を耳にし、普段より少し張り切っている。先生の前で演奏すると決まった日から、苦手なピアノの練習も、いつもより頑張っているのだとか。

Skills.Name: 開演：イシュ・ボシェテ
Skills.Desc:
Adopts a concentrated firing stance for 10s.
While in this stance, movement and normal attacks are disabled, and changes EX Skill for the next three uses (skill is immediately redrawn each time).
CC effects will cancel the concentrated firing stance.

ExtraSkills.Name: 旋律の一音目
ExtraSkills.Desc:
Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a straight line. Damage to subsequent enemies is reduced by 45% per enemy hit (to a minimum of 10% of the original damage).
This attack ignores Stability and will always deal its maximum damage.
Increases the remaining duration of concentrated firing stance to 10s.

ExtraSkills.Name: 旋律の二音目
ExtraSkills.Desc:
Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a straight line. Damage to subsequent enemies is reduced by 45% per enemy hit (to a minimum of 10% of the original damage).
This attack ignores Stability and will always deal its maximum damage.
Increases the remaining duration of concentrated firing stance to 10s.

ExtraSkills.Name: 終演の旋律
ExtraSkills.Desc:
Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a straight line. Damage to subsequent enemies is reduced by 45% per enemy hit (to a minimum of 10% of the original damage).
This attack ignores Stability and will always deal its maximum damage.
Ends concentrated firing stance after activation.

Skills.Name: 抜かりない準備
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:EnhanceExplosionRate> by <?1> and <b:HIT> by <?2> at the start of battle. (Activates only once per battle)

Skills.Name: 演奏に臨む心
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> and <b:CriticalChance> by <?2>.

Skills.Name: 演奏に臨む心+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?3> and <b:CriticalChance> by <?2> plus a further <?4>.

Skills.Name: 想いをここに
Skills.Desc: While in concentrated firing stance, increases <b:EnhanceExplosionRate> by <?1> and become immune to <c:Provoke>.

Weapon.Name: 終幕：デストロイヤー
Weapon.Desc:
ヒナが自身の手足のように扱うマシンガン。

普段、校則を違反したり風紀を乱す者に対して、無慈悲さを見せる代物だが、今回だけは、誰かのために心を込めて丁寧に扱っている。

Name: Kayoko (Dress)
CharacterSSRNew:
心配だけど……
大丈夫。全て上手くいく
ProfileIntroduction:
オペラハウスに潜入した、ゲヘナ学園所属、便利屋68の課長。

慣れない服装だとは言ったものの、そういった様子は全然感じられない。本人は周りの視線など気にせず、やるべき仕事を淡々とこなしていく。

Skills.Name: シャドウショット
Skills.Desc:
Deals <?1> damage to one enemy. This attack ignores <?2> of the enemy's DEF. While in <s:CH0239_ExtraPassive> status, this attack is also guaranteed critical.
(<s:CH0239_ExtraPassive> status is removed after activation).

Skills.Name: 取り戻した感覚
Skills.Desc: Every 25s, increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> for 16s.

Skills.Name: 暗殺者の目
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: 暗殺者の目+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: 潜入行動
Skills.Desc:
Begin combat with the <s:CH0239_ExtraPassive> status. If attacked, this status is removed. After losing the <s:CH0239_ExtraPassive> status, it will be regained if not attacked for 10s.
Also increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> while in the <s:CH0239_ExtraPassive> status.

Weapon.Name: デモンズロア
Weapon.Desc:
カヨコが普段持ち歩いている拳銃。

サイレンサーつきで、密かな潜入任務でも実用的だ。

Name: Aru (Dress)
CharacterSSRNew:
ついにこの日が来たわね。
まあ、見ていてちょうだい
ProfileIntroduction:
潜入任務の依頼を請けた、ゲヘナ学園所属、便利屋68の社長。

普段はあまり着ることのない服装だが完璧に着こなしている。願ってもないハードボイルドな仕事を請けて心を弾ませているが、顔には出さない。

Skills.Name: 興味深い提案
Skills.Desc: Increases the <b:CriticalDamage> of one ally except self by <?1> for 30s.

Skills.Name: 有意義な取引
Skills.Desc: Every 50s, restores the HP of the ally with the lowest HP (excluding self) by <?1> of Healing.

Skills.Name: ドレスアップ
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: ドレスアップ+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: 有利な取引
Skills.Desc: Attacks have a 30% chance to decrease the target's <d:CriticalChanceResistPoint> by <?1> for 13s. 5s cooldown between activations.

Weapon.Name: ワインレッド・アドマイアー
Weapon.Desc:
特別な任務でも手放さないアルのスナイパーライフル。

ゴージャスな場面で、その美しさはより一段と輝く。

Name: Akari (New Year)
CharacterSSRNew:
新年、まず何を食べるかですね。
もちろん、食べる量も
ProfileIntroduction:
新年を迎えて着物に着替えた、ゲヘナ学園所属、美食研究会のアカリ。

いつものように微笑みを絶やさないが、心なしか少し浮かれているようにも見える。新しく年を越すことに胸を膨らませているのか、それとも……

Skills.Name: 少しお借りしました！
Skills.Desc: Deploys Akari aboard a School Lunch Promotion Vehicle for 30s, granting it an additional <?1> of Akari's <b:MAXHP>. The School Lunch Promotion Vehicle does not perform normal attacks. Only one tactical support vehicle may be deployed at any given time.

Skills.Name: こんなのはどうですか？
Skills.Desc: Every 40s, creates a circular area centered on the ally with the lowest HP in which allies' <b:DEF> is increased by <?1>, as long as they stay within range, for 30s.

Skills.Name: いただきます！
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

Skills.Name: いただきます！+
Skills.Desc: Increases <b:MAXHP> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

Skills.Name: もっとほしい方？
Skills.Desc: Increases all allies' <b:EnhanceMysticRate> by <?1>.

Weapon.Name: ボトムレス
Weapon.Desc:
アカリが愛用するアサルトライフル。

彼女の旅を、食を阻害するのであれば、まずこの銃と対話することになるであろう。

Name: Umika
CharacterSSRNew:
お祭りが開かれるって聞いて駆けつけてきました！
あれ……違いますか？
ProfileIntroduction:
百鬼夜行連合学院所属、お祭り運営委員会の1年生部員。

田舎出身で、昔から都会で開催されるお祭りに興味津々だという。キヴォトス全域で行われるお祭りは全て覚えているほどの専門家。口を開けばマイナーなお祭りの話題で早口になりがちで、黙っていれば美人だとよく言われる。
Hobby: お祭り体験、お祭り関連グッズ（パンフレット）集め

修学旅行を迎え百鬼夜行を案内するガイドの役割につくが、睡眠の修行も諦めない。時には居眠りをしたり、時には鋭く核心を突いたりするなど、さりげなく両方をこなしている。
